perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Eau de Rochas Citron Soleil, a Citrus Floral Musk, takes you to the Mediterranean Riviera, at the foot of a lemon tree, in a fragrant setting bathed in sunshine.
Eau de Rochas Citron Soleil is a luminous, fresh, and contemporary eau de toilette that is simply delicious. A true star of the perfume, Lemon essence radiates its tangy freshness. The sweetness of Neroli and the crunch of Fig Leaves transport you directly under the lemon trees in bloom. In the heart, Orange Blossom radiates these different facets that are intense and delicate, warm and fresh. In the drydown, the cottony softness of White Musks creates an absolutely irresistible wake. A solar and enveloping fragrance refreshed by a tangy wave for comfortable and radiant wear.
A modern and timeless bottle, faceted and tinted with a sparkling yellow, recalls the iconic Eau de Rochas bottle. A revisited and colorful design whose obvious simplicity creates impact.
Top note: Lemon essence, Neroli, Fig leaf
Heart note: Orange blossom, Rosé accord, Aquatic floral accord
Base Note: White Musks, Oriental Accord, Vibrant Woods
Available as a 100ml Eau de Toilette.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Juliette Has A Gun launches Juliette in 2024 as a fragrance of seductive dark cherry blended with woody and spicy notes of pink pepper, cashmeran, and at its heart, beautiful jasmine absolute. It is described as a very sensual fragrance with a long-lasting trail and an elegant and romantic facet with a flirtatious side and a hint of rebellion.
"With Juliette, I wanted to illustrate what she would be in 2024. A symbol of untamed femininity, powerful, free, passionate. She aims to be the one and only in the spotlight, she's leading the dance."
The bottle, in a passionate red, is Juliette’s reflection.

Pink Woods is a mesmerizingly delightful fragrance introduced by LOVENOTES. Captivating and instantly appealing, this fragrance opens with sparkling notes of Italian Bergamot, making it bright and inviting. A divine woodiness comes from both the back and heart and is wrapped in alluring Vetiver and Lotus Flower. A beautiful blend of Tonka Bean and Cashmere Woods shines with a subtle hint of Cotton Candy, creating an unexpected addicting yet unforgettable signature.
"LOVENOTES Pink Woods
Airy. Dreamy. Entrancing.
Introducing Pink Woods, the mesmerizingly delightful fragrance.
A LOVENOTE from Ariana Grande to the world, exclusively available in North America.
Captivating and instantly appealing, this fragrance opens with sparkling notes of Italian Bergamot making the fragrance bright and inviting.  A divine woodiness comes from both the back and heart and is wrapped in alluring Vetiver and Lotus Flower. A beautiful blend of Tonka Bean and Cashmere Woods shines with a subtle hint of Cotton Candy, creating an unexpected addicting yet unforgettable signature.

perfumes_data.name: Hacivat X Nishane for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Hacivat X by Nishane is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Hacivat X was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Julien Rasquinet. perfumes_data.detailed_description:
HACIVAT X is the new interpretation of NISHANE’s global hit HACIVAT (launched in 2017), paying homage to the traditional shadow play character with a chypre structure that exudes elegance, competence, and love of art. This fragrance is a celebration of life, with stimulating notes of pineapple and bergamot backed by woody notes. It features top notes of juicy pineapple, zesty bergamot, and spicy pink pepper, leading to a heart of refreshing lime, delicate jasmine,and orange blossom. The base notes include earthy patchouli, woody cedarwood, and vetiver from Haiti.
NISHANE is looking forward to hearing the thoughts of the crowded HACIVAT fans worldwide about HACIVAT X and is sure that it will quickly become a new favorite amongst the fragrance enthusiasts with its highly addictive and noticeable scent.
TOP NOTES
bergamot - pineapple - pepper pink
HEART NOTES
lime - jasmine - orange flower
BASE NOTES
patchouli - cedarwood heart - vetiver oil haiti

perfumes_data.name: Blue Mediterraneo Mirto di Panarea Limited Edition 2024 Acqua di Parma for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Blue Mediterraneo Mirto di Panarea Limited Edition 2024 by Acqua di Parma is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Blue Mediterraneo Mirto di Panarea Limited Edition 2024 was launched in 2024. Top notes are Italian Lemon, Bergamot, Myrtle and Basil; middle notes are Jasmine and Damask Rose; base notes are Amber, Cedarwood and Juniper.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Mirto di Panarea by Acqua di Parma is inspired by an island suspended in time, combining sparkling citrus accents with notes of myrtle and the freshness of juniper. The fragrance recalls the joyful spirit of summer with the aromatic warmth of myrtle, basil, and the sparkling citrus notes of lemon and Calabrian bergamot. Accents of sea breeze and fresh juniper meet with rose and jasmine, instilling a sensation of peace and harmony.
"An original motif of circles, triangles and swirls, created by Dorothée Meilichzon, decorates the special packaging of Mirto di Panarea eau de toilette in a tribute to the serene beauty of the sea and the vibrant energy of the sun that touches the waves. The fragrance recalls the joyful spirit of summer with the aromatic warmth of myrtle that combines with basil and the sparkling citrus notes of lemon and Calabrian bergamot. Accents of sea breeze and fresh juniper meet with rose and jasmine, instilling a sensation of peace and harmony.
Mirto di Panarea is presented in the unmistakable Acqua di Parma bottle, embellished with a decorated cap. An icon of Art Deco, the bottle is made of pure glass in shades of deep blue, which in a play of reflections evokes the transparency of the sea."

perfumes_data.name: Nina Le Parfum Nina Ricci for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Nina Le Parfum by Nina Ricci is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Nina Le Parfum was launched in 2023. Nina Le Parfum was created by Olivier Cresp, Ilias Ermenidis and Nathalie Lorson. Top notes are Red Apple, Apple, Green Apple and Italian Lemon; middle notes are Tuberose, Orange Blossom and Gardenia; base notes are Amberwood and Vanilla.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Discover the amplified intensity of the original Nina scent! Nina Le Parfum is the latest pure and vegan fragrance by Nina Ricci, encouraging you to trust your instincts.
With its captivating allure, Nina Le Parfum tempts you to take risks and hypnotizes you. Let the enticing blend of juicy apples, elegant white flowers, and warm amber wood awaken your curiosity. This fruity, woody, and floral Eau de Parfum lets you explore the limitless bounds of your imagination.
Crafted from 91% naturally derived ingredients, this pure and vegan perfume includes the signature component of the original Nina fragrance, the recycled Italian lemon. The fruits discarded from the food industry due to their size or appearance are repurposed instead of being destroyed, serving as raw fragrance materials. Every part of the lemon, from the flesh to the peel, is utilized, achieving an extra tangy, citrus scent.
“With Nina Le Parfum, we wanted to capture the temptation of forbidden fruit with a trio of natural apple extracts, which is given a body with warm amber wood. A surprising and daring Eau De Parfum to mark a new era for the iconic Nina perfumes.” –Olivier Cresp, Master Perfumer – Ilias Ermenidis, Perfumer
Nina Le Parfum, created with sublime apple extracts, opens with an explosion of fresh fruit. The recycled Italian lemon invigorates the enchanting mixture, accentuating the irresistible allure of the iconic Nina notes. An elegant bouquet of white flowers unfolds at the heart of the perfume, composed of orange blossom, gardenia, and tuberose, bestowing a profound sophistication onto the composition. The warm notes of amber wood combined with vanilla infuse a gentle sensuality for a softer result.
The iconic apple-shaped Nina perfume bottle now wears a charming, bright pink exterior, adding a fresh spin to the scent's appearance. The shiny surface is adorned with silver streaks for a visually delightful brilliance, too enticing to resist. The bottle is crowned with a vibrant pink ribbon, resulting in an utterly captivating and dazzling spectacle.
Top note: Apple trio, Lemon
Heart note: Gardenia, Orange blossom
Base note: Orientalwood, Vanilla
Nina Le Parfum is available as a 30ml, 50ml and 80ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: L'Air du Temps x Atelier Anne Brun Nina Ricci for women

The nose behind this fragrance is Sonia Constant. Top notes are Coconut, Pear and Bergamot; middle notes are Tiare Flower, Tuberose and Heliotrope; base notes are Benzoin, Sandalwood and Vetiver.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Explore the exquisite new rendition of L'Air du Temps Eau de Parfum by Nina Ricci, masterfully reimagined by the gilding virtuoso, Anne Brun.
Embracing the rich tradition of French craftsmanship, Nina Ricci has joined forces with Atelier Anne Brun to present a unique, limited edition of this cherished women's fragrance, L'Air du Temps.
Encased in a fragile lattice of golden blooms, this iconic fragrance bottle is enhanced with Anne Brun's distinguished artistic touches, transforming it into a timeless artwork, as elegant as fine jewelry.
This creation's brilliance is echoed in the scent's new iteration: a radiant, musky amber floral essence brimming with the warmth of sunlight.
Top Notes: Bergamot, Pear, Coconut
Heart Notes: Tiare Flower Accord, Tuberose, Heliotrope
Base Notes: Sandalwood, Vetiver, Benzoin

Top notes are Bergamot, Honey and Cacao; middle notes are Frangipani, Marshmallow, Neroli, Coconut and Lily of the Valley; base notes are Musk, Vanilla, Toffee and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Wearing Lucky candy is like drawing a tarot card that continually unveils a delicious surprise. When the marshmallow pops up, you know you’re in for a treat .. your wheel of fortune has appeared. Bergamot and honey commence this sweet celebration, joined by a dollop of coconut cream. Then, it enters the frangipani flower, which raises this scent to another level of delectation. Follow this with a creamy caramel wave of amber and musk kissed by vanilla and sweet toffee. Say hello to your new lucky charm.
TOP NOTES
Roasted Mexican Cocoa Bean, Bergamot Zest, Sweet Honey.
HEART NOTES
Marshmallow & Neroli, Lily of the Valley, Mexican Coconut Cream, Frangipani Flower.
BASE NOTES
Vanilla Pods from Reunion Island, Sweet Toffee, Dry Oriental, Fluffy Musk.
Available as 100ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: "Lilac reimagined as a sophisticated gourmand. Delicate lilac blossoms and fresh mimosa, brightened by a surprising twist of tangy rhubarb, lead to a heart of sweet marzipan and soft vanilla cream. The base reveals rich notes of sandalwood and cedar wrapped in a warm embrace of praline and tonka bean. Like discovering a secret pastry shop in a spring garden, Lilac Brûlée balances the familiar and unexpected: classic lilac finds new expression in a modern gourmand composition." -Fzotic website.

It features notes of chocolate, cardamom, vanilla cream, sandalwood, benzoin Sumatra, and a hint of waffle cone, evoking memories of youthful indulgence and romantic escapades.

perfumes_data.name: like an Egyptian... Miller et Bertaux for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: like an Egyptian... by Miller et Bertaux is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. like an Egyptian... was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Lucien Ferrero. Top notes are Black Pepper, Pink Pepper and Caraway; middle notes are Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha, Oud, Amber Xtreme and Rose; base notes are Vetyver, Labdanum, Sandalwood, Amber and Ambrocenide.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"Like an Egyptian," the 17th Eau de Parfum from Miller et Bertaux, beckons you to traverse both time and space. This scent is a captivating journey, transporting you in a moment to the birthplace of fragrances—the era of the Pharaohs. Conceived as a mystical tribute to ancient aromatic concoctions, the perfume is daringly reimagined for contemporary sensibilities by Lucien Ferrero, marking his triumphant comeback to Miller et Bertaux. This heavenly elixir draws inspiration from the ancient Kyphi formula, decoded from an age-old papyrus scroll.
Top notes: Black Pepper, Peruvian Pink Pepper
Heart notes: Indian Cypriol, Oud Boya, Oriental Xtreme
Base notes: Indian Sandalwood, Labdanum Absolute, Oriental, Ambrocenide, Indian Vetyver

perfumes_data.name: Philtre Hiram Green for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Philtre by Hiram Green is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Philtre was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Hiram Green.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"What does PHILTRE smell like? Let me set the scene:

By moonlight, the alchemist prepares his philtre, a potion for love and its reciprocation. Around him are a dozen open wood drawers, the contents of which have no name. No need: he knows the recipe by heart. Into a chalice he deposits them carefully—a sprinkle of a fine, powdered spice, a dash of a viscous inky tincture. And for a finishing touch, a single red carnation. As it simmers, the potion begins to glow, emitting a light that warms the whole room." -Hiram Green.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Luce di Rosa by Acqua di Parma is a dynamic rose fragrance, infused with masterful light and wrapped in the light notes of the house's Italian citrus. This unisex fragrance captures and reflects the complexity of precious ingredients with vibrant sophistication. The heart features noble Bulgarian Rose complemented by verdant geranium, while the base unfolds around vetiver, guaiac wood, cedar, and musky nuances.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Elixir represents a new opus of femininity on the Elie Saab: a love potion sparkling with sensuality. It is imagined as the love potion of a powerful, deeply sensual and magnetic woman.
At the heart, the orris from Lebanon is combined with a love accord, an olfactive creation that recreates a powerful emotion of attachment and seduction. It is brightened by a sparkling duo of neroli and mandarin. A carnal accord with ambery facets of myrrh and benzoin warm the composition in the base.
Top notes: Mandarin essence, Neroli essence
Heart notes: Iris, Love accord
Base notes: Oriental woods, Myrrh, Benzoin
The new bottle is shaped like a precious, faceted sphere. The bottle cap is golden and engraved with the monogram of Elie Saab’s house.
Available as a 30, 50 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Lentezza Carezza Filippo Sorcinelli for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Lentezza Carezza by Filippo Sorcinelli is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lentezza Carezza was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Filippo Sorcinelli. Top notes are prickly pear, Myrrh, Bergamot and Orange; middle notes are Green Accord, Cedarwood, Cyclamen and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Benzoin, Vanilla, Sandalwood and Tonka Bean.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
I would like to get dirty slowly,
precious useless angel
slow sun fire
where the water rests with me
and caress the song of the skin.
A watch made of honey
with the hours marked by a warm wind
shadows of cicadas
silence of the prickly pear
in an orange
that stings the loneliness.
What does it mean today: "there is no hurry"?
In the obsession of the speed paradoxically the cognition of the time is lost. Here then the desire to stop to recognize and build the solitude of a sunny afternoon.
Slowness then becomes a necessary Caress, almost like boredom, to sink into the limits of silence and continue to listen to life in a way that has now become unknown.
Relying on the arms of a wind without running, which moves the earth burned by memories, is a courage of few, because bathing in this value revolutionizes and repairs.
Lentezza Carezza is a summer smell where loving each other becomes a tool for addressing others with new eyes and a reconstructed soul.
A perfume that transforms the perception of remaining motionless, becoming «a new form of resistance, in a world where everything is too fast. And where the greatest power is to decide what to do with one's time», as Sepùlveda says.

perfumes_data.name: Ambre Rubis Houbigant for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Ambre Rubis by Houbigant is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ambre Rubis was launched in 2024. Ambre Rubis was created by Luca Maffei and Antoine Lie. Top notes are Red Berries, Pink Pepper, Orange and Incense; middle notes are Cherry, Rum and Jasmine; base notes are Ambergris, Woody Notes, Cedar and Fir Resin.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Collection Les Ambres captures the most precious and emblematic elements of the Orient region through a sophisticated and contemporary olfactory alchemy. Inspired by the exceptional craftsmanship, cultural richness and unrivalled beauty of the Orient, this collection celebrates power and elegance through innovative and captivating olfactory compositions.
Created in four hands with Luca Maffei and Antoine Lie, each fragrance is a unique creation that blends multi-faceted amber with an avant-garde touch, offering a timeless sensory immersion.
Ambre Rubis Eau de Parfum by Houbigant, released in 2024, is classified as a fragrance for women and men and belongs to the Oriental family. The composition opens with notes of orange, incense, and pink pepper (red berries), followed by a heart of rum, cherry, and jasmine. The base consists of woody notes, cedar, grey amber, and fir resin (balsam).

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"Cosmic Kylie Jenner is a sweet, warm floral, elevated scent that is perfect for day and night. An ambery floral eau de parfum, the scent is magnetic, addictive, and out of this world. The sculptural bottle was designed to look like a piece of art from another world and is formed to fit perfectly in the palm of your hand."
Top: star jasmine and blood orange

Available in 10, 30, 50, and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Lionora Mind Games for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Lionora by Mind Games is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lionora was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christelle Laprade. Top notes are Passionfruit, Tonka Bean and Ginger; middle notes are Apricot, Osmanthus and Freesia; base notes are Lactones, Tonka Bean, Sandalwood and Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The elusive scent of Lionora celebrates the seductive allure of grace, beauty, and wisdom. Indulgent bursts of fruits and florals soak into the honeyed, animalic notes of Osmanthus fragrance, before melting into the soft and creamy notes of sandalwood in this luxury perfume. Powerful in its delicacy, and completely enchanting, Lionora captures the passion and romance of new love, and the strength and sweetness of true love.
"Lionora is meant to immerse the senses in the multidimensional texture of apricot skin and blooming white floralcy. Top notes of ginger Madagascar and passionfruit are encased in the soft heart of freesia and the delicate, blossoming petals of our Osmanthus DeLaire. Creamy, edible sandalwood and tonkalactoneleave a warming, skin- hugging trail that feels effortlessly elegant and timeless." - Christelle Laprade, Perfumer.

perfumes_data.name: Ilio Limited Edition Diptyque for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Ilio Limited Edition by Diptyque is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ilio Limited Edition was launched in 2023.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
From the prickly pears clustering along a narrow cove to the lavender and lemongrass on a terrace at sunset, to smell their scents is to be swept away to a far-off place. A warm breeze blows through Barbary figs: this is Ilio. Like summer condensed, it carries the scent of these Mediterranean trees far beyond their native landscapes. Drenched in sun with a sea view.
The American artist Erik Winkowski has decorated each item in the collection. The Maison's iconic oval is enlivened with color, while original illustrations adorn the box. This is a summer to be experienced with all the senses.

perfumes_data.name: Essencial Sentir Natura for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Essencial Sentir by Natura is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Essencial Sentir was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Verônica Kato.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Experience this unique olfactory experience. The highlight here is tuberose, a white flower with unique intensity and timeless elegance. Its aroma becomes even more sensual when combined with jasmine. Pear, raspberry and pataqueira provide a balance of freshness and luminosity. Pataqueira, a plant native to the Amazon, is an exclusive ingredient from Natura.

perfumes_data.name: All Of Me Intense Narciso Rodriguez for women

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
All Of Me Intense by Narciso Rodriguez is a new feminine fragrance designed for a determined and self-confident woman. Made with 90% natural ingredients, the fragrance opens with a seductive accord of black iris, rose, and geranium. The heart of musk combines with vanilla in the base notes for an even more irresistible trail. It belongs to the floriental musky fragrance family and is described as bold and inhibited.
Available as 30ml, 50ml, and 100ml Eau de Parfum Intense.

perfumes_data.name: Un Été Obvious for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Un Été by Obvious is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Un Été was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Meabh McCurtin. Top notes are Mandarin Orange, Clementine and Ginger; middle notes are Matcha Tea, Mate and Orange Blossom; base notes are Vanilla, Tonka Bean and Peru Balsam.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Un Été represents an ode to freedom. This fragrance reminds of the creamy notes of sunscreen on your skin after a long day at the beach. The top notes, composed of tangerine, ginger and tangerine oil, give the fragrance a touch of freshness and piquancy. Next, the vanilla bean and matcha accord make the scent last on your skin.

The Eau de Parfum begins with a soft, rosy hue, ignited by the lively fusion of Sichuan pepper, mandarin orange, and Asian pink peach.

Model Juliet Searle, renowned for her piercing blue eyes, embodies the essence of an empowered yet romantic modern princess, seeking genuine emotions and inner reconnection.
Within this enchanting garden, the most magnificent blooms subtly release a delicious bouquet. Surrender to a burst of floral and fruity freshness, heightened by the opulence of three enchanting varieties of roses.

At the heart of the fragrance, the delicate nuances of white azalea intertwine with the delicious taste of Italian tiramisu, creating an iconic floral-gourmand combination that exudes sophistication and luxury.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: ORANGER SIROCCO was born out of a desire to imagine an olfactory landmark, a sensory compass that is both bright and joyful. This ‘Eau de Parfum’ embodies a return to simpler values, presents itself as an ode to life, and aims to be somewhat contemplative. From the first notes, the mind is carried away by a warm, shimmering wind of sand, on the other side of the Mediterranean, in the heart of an orange blossom grove. With closed eyes, scents and sounds intertwine: the powerful and intoxicating fragrance of orange blossoms, echoing the distant hustle and bustle of a souk, where the aroma of spices mixes in waves, saturating the regular breath of the sirocco.

perfumes_data.name: Good Fortune Elixir Intense Viktor&Rolf for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Good Fortune Elixir Intense by Viktor&Rolf is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Good Fortune Elixir Intense was launched in 2023. Top note is Incense; middle notes are Jasmine and Solar Notes; base notes are Bourbon Vanilla, Palo Santo and Sandalwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Immersive and alluring, Good Fortune Elixir Intense Eau de Parfum pulls you in with an entrancing note of incense, paired with an extraordinarily rich infusion of Jasmine. The scent journey continues with the introduction of a mystical Palo Santo blend accompanied by a delicious touch of Bourbon Vanilla.
Good Fortune Elixir Intense represents a more enticing and potent iteration of the original Eau de Parfum. Enigmatic and sensuous, this Intense Eau de Parfum serves as the ultimate charm to seize control of your fate. The fragrance greets you with an enthralling incense note, delicately woven with an ultra-rich Jasmine infusion radiating solar notes. The scent narrative unfolds a mystic harmony: Palo Santo, an incense wood revered for its cleansing properties, is married with a delicious hint of ethically-sourced Madagascar Vanilla Bourbon and Caledonian sandalwood, leading to a seductive, profound, and lavish trail.
Aligning with the ethics and long-term environmental commitment of Maison Viktor&Rolf, Good Fortune Elixir Intense is a cruelty-free fragrance, free from any animal-derived ingredients.
The Good Fortune Elixir Intense is presented in an enigmatic glass container designed like a crystal orb, topped with a faceted amethyst cap that symbolizes strength and positive energy.
Taking inspiration from Maison Viktor&Rolf's "Spiritual Glamour" Haute Couture collection, Good Fortune Elixir Intense Eau de Parfum is a physical representation of a refreshing, positive lifestyle. It serves as an aromatic proclamation around spirituality and self-empowerment, bestowing upon you the power to shape your own destiny.
Top notes: Incense
Middle notes: Solar Jasmine Superinfusion
Base notes: Vanilla Bourbon, Palo Santo, and Caledonian Sandalwood.

perfumes_data.name: Hexensalbe Stora Skuggan for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Hexensalbe by Stora Skuggan is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Hexensalbe was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Anna Barkne. Top notes are Licorice and Wormwood; middle notes are Angelica, Rosemary, Belladonna and Tuberose; base notes are Patchouli, Black hemlock or Tsuga and Oakmoss.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Hexensalbe is a dark floral fragrance, rooted in the botanical underworld of witchcraft.
Hexensalbe, also known as witches’ flying ointment, was a hallucinogenic salve used in witchcraft in the middle ages. It was a mixture of extremely poisonous ingredients that produced an ecstatic trance with powerful sensations of flying, images of otherworldly creatures and a primal sexual hunger.
The ointment was so poisonous that eating it would be directly fatal, instead it was applied to other soft membranes of the body, armpits and more commonly the genitals. Because of the erotic effects of the high, the salve would often be rubbed directly onto a phallic object like the end of a staff or a broomstick. And so the popular image of witches riding on broomsticks has survived into our times, even if they rode them in a rather different sense. There are records from the 1200’s and forward where women have been found naked in a delirious trance, pleasuring themselves with the spicy devil’s dildo.

The verticality of hinoki wood supports the entire composition, with golden sesame extract as an intermediary, resonating in a sillage of addictive comfort.

Fendi is launching its first fragrance collection in the summer of 2024, as it prepares to celebrate its 100th anniversary in 2025. This special collection features unique perfumes that capture the essence and stories of the women who have shaped the Italian fashion industry and the Maison, a legacy handed down through generations.
The collection includes seven exquisite fragrances inspired by the close-knit Fendi family, each blending rich and evocative ingredients. Each scent is crafted to evoke cherished memories and reflect the distinct personalities within the Fendi family.

The collection will be in stores starting June 20, 2024.
La Baguette: Sophisticated simplicity meets the signature bag.

The warmth of oud is intensified by a rush of fresh pink pepper, while silver fir balsam and ambergris balance earthy and maritime nuances. A wave of smoky wood embraces sensual, skin-clinging musk. Oud Minérale combines rich oud notes with refreshing oceanic minerals.

perfumes_data.name: The Language Of Glaciers Imaginary Authors for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: The Language Of Glaciers by Imaginary Authors is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. The Language Of Glaciers was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Josh Meyer.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
SYNOPSIS: 
Have you ever stood alone atop a mountain with chunky snowflakes swirling all around? Such is the splendor you will experience within The Language of Glaciers, a romantic epic which reaches incredible heights and inspires one to leave no moment unappreciated. From the stillness of a moonlit snowshoe excursion, to the rush of witnessing an avalanche safely from above, the recollections of our unnamed narrator will captivate you the same way the solitary song of the snow owl captivated them. Find comfort in the cold and begin to see the world from stunning new perspectives. Critics have called it “A slow-paced story that will burrow straight to the center of your soul” and “Sharp as ice and smooth as a glacial lake.”
NOTES:
White Pine, Lilac, Cashmere, Juniper, Forget Me Not, Blue Bugle, Virgin Snowfall.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: This rich and enveloping perfume is simply impossible to resist. Its Pistachio notes give this fragrance an unmistakable gourmand essence and perfectly complement the fruity nuances of Blackcurrant, Peach Blossom and Coconut Water, the middle notes of the composition. Its base notes of Caramel and Salt Crystals offer a sublime sweet and savoury contrast.

Dreams inspire our creativity, they surround us with images, memories, and sensations. Les Eaux Rêvées expresses this imagination, where inspirations from different generations come together, collide and complement each other - the d'Ornan family, SISLEY.
A BOUQUET OF RETURNS AFTER THE RAIN
Rêvée d'Eliya returns to the rainforest and invites you to immerse yourself in a utopian jungle that comes to life after the rain: a new, untouched garden full of mystical birds and unfamiliar sounds. Its intriguing, warm and aromatic atmosphere is the origin of the sparkling sivas, where exotic flowers combine with tuberose and violets.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Its very name is intriguing, languorous: Inverness. A land of peat, heather and golden rain, beyond the senses, aptly known as the capital of the Highlands, the largest region in Scotland. Nature reigns free, unspoilt, extraordinary, and the River Ness forges its curves and mysteries. The odours of different varieties of wood rising up from this endless green and bracing empire, each more captivating and fragrant than the last.

perfumes_data.name: Strawberry Letter Phlur for women

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Ripe for the picking.
Alluring, addictive and undeniably sexy, STRAWBERRY LETTER is a crisp, fruity gourmand that opens with playful juiciness and then transitions with unexpectedly chic decadence. Pulpy red strawberries combine with juicy plum nectar to provide a burst of brightness. Fresh florals cascade on top of a sensual mix of amber and tonka bean to reveal a fragrance that is compelling and surprisingly complex. Like a love note sealed with a kiss, STRAWBERRY LETTER is hard to forget.
PERFUMER: Gabriela Chelariu
OLFACTIVE FAMILY: Fruity Oriental
Top: Cassis Leaves, Strawberry Gariguette, Plum Nectar
Heart: Wild Lily, Red Poppy, Apple Blossom
Base: Earthy Woods, Tonka Bean, Sugared Oriental

Available as a 50ml Eau de Parfum

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Tom Ford launches Myrrhe Mystère, a new addition to the Private Blend collection, in September 2023. The new exclusive creation delves into the enigmatic world of amber, crafted to showcase Tom Ford's personal interpretation of the ingredient of myrrh.
Myrrhe Mystère embraces the rarity and exclusivity fueled by the ingredient's ancient heritage and expands olfactory horizons with the allure of warm, woody, and sweet notes.
The composition develops with myrrh essence and myrrh resinoid absolute, wrapped up in smooth sandalwood and vanilla notes.
Tom Ford Myrrhe Mystère is available as a 30 and 50 ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: La Petite Robe Noire L'Eau Rose Eau de Parfum Guerlain for women
perfumes_data.short_description: La Petite Robe Noire L'Eau Rose Eau de Parfum by Guerlain is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. La Petite Robe Noire L'Eau Rose Eau de Parfum was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Delphine Jelk. Top notes are Black Cherry and Bergamot; middle notes are Rose Water, Rose, Almond and Black Tea; base notes are Tonka Bean, Patchouli and Licorice.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
For this new limited edition, La Petite Robe Noire by Guerlain unveils its first alcohol-free fragrance: L'Eau Rose.
"L'Eau Rose gradually unfurls to leave a bespoke rose scent that combines the freshness of rose essence with the soft, naturally honeyed fragrance of a rose absolute that’s true to the original Eau de Parfum. La Petite Robe Noire’s sumptuous rose, faceted by the most beautiful notes in perfumery, and its instantly recognisable olfactory signature is revealed in all its purity. "
Embodying the chic and effortless style of Parisian women, La Petite Robe Noire is a celebration of freedom, love, and elegance. This fragrance is a tribute to the rose, crafted with a signature blend of the finest black notes in perfumery, symbolizing a unique blend of joy and irreverence.
This latest creation marks a milestone as Guerlain’s inaugural alcohol-free perfume: L'Eau Rose. Composed of 92% natural ingredients, L'Eau Rose merges the beloved scent of the original La Petite Robe Noire eau de parfum with the revitalizing and hydrating properties of an innovative rose water-based formula. This new fragrance approach offers a gentle yet indulgent experience, available for a limited time only.
The iconic “inverted heart” bottle, a staple since 1912, is reimagined for La Petite Robe Noire L'Eau Rose. It features a custom pastel pink lacquer that evokes the soft petals of a delicate rose, reflecting the tender essence of this alcohol-free fragrance.
Top notes: bergamot, black cherry
Middle notes: rose essence, almond, black tea, Damascena rose water
Base notes: patchouli, tonka bean, licorice
Available as 100ml Eau de Parfum, limited edition.

"I created a bold yet sensual fragrance that dances with you until the sun comes up. A smooth take on Sol de Janeiro’s signature warmth with the intoxicating surprise of night-blooming jasmine."—Gino Percontino.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Bath & Body Works Gingham Gorgeous Fine Fragrance Mist is a newly launched product from the popular American brand, Bath & Body Works. This fragrance mist contains an alcohol-based formula that is lightweight and easy to wear for everyday use. As a fine fragrance mist, it has a lower concentration of fragrance oils compared to an eau de parfum, making it ideal for those who prefer a more subtle scent. The Gingham Gorgeous Fine Fragrance Mist belongs to the Floral Fruity group of fragrances and is designed to evoke happiness and femininity with its beautiful floral notes. The fragrance notes of the Gingham Gorgeous Fine Fragrance Mist include pink strawberries, peach nectar, and peony blooms. The scent starts off with a sweet and fruity aroma of strawberries and peach, which then blends into a floral heart of peonies. The overall effect is a beautifully balanced fragrance that smells both feminine and fresh. This fragrance would be ideal for those who love fruity scents but also want a touch of floral elegance. The Gingham Gorgeous Fine Fragrance Mist is perfect for spring and summer wear or for any occasion that calls for a light and refreshing fragrance.

Ideal for everyday use and perfect to combine with other fragrances to bring comfort and delicacy. In the packaging, the rigid box that accompanies the cologne follows the visual identity of the Vintage line, with delicate illustrations that refer to the fragrance and give the balanced sophistication that the line proposes.

perfumes_data.name: Tiffany & Co Rose Gold Intense Tiffany for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Tiffany & Co Rose Gold Intense by Tiffany is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Tiffany & Co Rose Gold Intense was launched in 2023. perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Tiffany & Co. Rose Gold Eau de Parfum Intense comes out in September 2023, celebrating the house's expertise in precious metals, evoking the sleek and contemporary spirit of rose gold. Maintaining the core identity of the original Rose Gold fragrance, Rose Gold Intense evolves the story for a deeper, richer sensorial experience.

The composition consists of a vibrant world of sparkling citrus and fruits, balanced with radiant pink pepper. At its heart lies a bouquet of orange blossom and jasmine sambac that are mixed with Turkish rose oil and orris butter. The base adds a playful complexity, anchored by an elegant, sustainably sourced patchouli, warm woods, pink sugar, and a marine accord.
Top note: Pink Pepper
Middle note: Orange Flower
Base note: Patchouli
Available in 30, 50 and 75 ml Eau de Parfum Intense.

perfumes_data.name: Comète Paradis 62 Parle Moi de Parfum for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Comète Paradis 62 by Parle Moi de Parfum is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Comète Paradis 62 was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Michel Almairac.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Comète Paradis by Parle Moi de Parfum is an exotic and seductive fragrance that offers a harmonious blend of warm and sensual notes. The composition combines high-quality dark cocoa and gentle tonka with a base note of sandalwood, giving the fragrance a deep and alluring sweetness. The perfume is rounded off with a warm coconut finish, reminiscent of tropical beaches and sun-drenched places. Comète Paradis is an elegant scent that embodies luxury and exoticism, perfect for anyone seeking a sensual and seductive fragrance.

perfumes_data.name: Ambrosia Aurea Laura Biagiotti for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Ambrosia Aurea by Laura Biagiotti is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Ambrosia Aurea was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Paolo Cerizza. Top notes are Chamomile, Vanilla, Narcissus, Orange and Medlar; middle notes are Linden Blossom, Fire Lily, Mock Orange and Carrot Seeds; base notes are Honey, Acácia, Tonka Bean, Chestnut and Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Ambrosia Aurea opens with a delicate and enticing blend of floral and citrus notes, as the fresh aroma of medlar leaf and narcissus intertwines with the uplifting scent of orange and the soothing sweetness of Roman chamomile and vanilla. This combination creates a bright and uplifting introduction, reminiscent of a sunlit garden in full bloom.
As the fragrance evolves, it moves into a captivating heart where the earthy warmth of carrot seed pairs with the fiery intensity of fire lily, balanced by the gentle sweetness of linden tree and the subtle floral notes of mock-orange. This middle phase adds depth and complexity to the scent, evoking a sense of mystery and allure.
Finally, the fragrance settles into a rich and comforting base, where the golden sweetness of honey combines with the soft sensuality of musk and the warm richness of tonka bean and wattleseed. This final phase leaves a lasting impression, wrapping the wearer in a cozy embrace of sweetness and warmth.
Top Notes: Elysian Narcissus, Vanilla Orange, Roman Chamomile, Nespola Leaves
Heart Notes: Orange Lily, Mythological Linden, Angelica Flower, Carrot Seeds
Base Notes
Acacia Chestnut Wood, Ambrosia Honey , Imperial Musk, Tonka Bean

perfumes_data.name: Lunatique Les Liquides Imaginaires for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Lunatique by Les Liquides Imaginaires is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lunatique was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Vincent Ricord. Top notes are Sichuan Pepper, Pear, Juniper, Marigold and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Blackcurrant, Carrot, Iris, Frankincense, Cyclamen, Ginger and Neroli; base notes are Leather, Oud, Sandalwood, Tonka Bean, Ambergris, Musk and Vetiver.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Lunatique invites you to embrace your darker, hidden aspects, revealing the depths of your personality. This unique fragrance is a journey of contrasts, from bright top notes to deep, mysterious undertones. It opens with a refreshing blend of juniper, pear, and the bold kick of Sichuan pepper, lifting your senses and preparing you for the adventure ahead. The heart reveals unexpected twists of iris, carrot, and neroli, blending a soft floral sweetness with earthy warmth. As the fragrance lingers, it transitions into a sultry base of leather, oud, and ambergris, underscored by rich sandalwood and a whisper of vetiver. The result is a magnetic, enigmatic scent that plays with light and mystery, much like the hidden aspects of your soul.

perfumes_data.name: Fan Your Flames X Nishane for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Fan Your Flames X by Nishane is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Fan Your Flames X was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Miroslav Petkov. Top notes are Coconut, Rum and Mastic or Lentisque; middle notes are Tobacco, Tonka Bean, Carrot and Thyme; base notes are Patchouli, Cedar and Oakmoss.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Inspired by the quote “Set your life on fire. Seek those who fan your flames” by Rumi, FAN YOUR FLAMES, launched in 2016, is another global hit of NISHANE. Underlining the desire of people to be surrounded by the friends who would encourage them no matter what they want to do with their life, the original formula offers a blend of notes that evoke a warm and inviting atmosphere. The new offering FAN YOUR FLAMES X is designed to soften the flames of the original bestseller by a gentle touch of tropical flavors.
The fragrance opens with a combination of coconut, rum, and lentisque, which gives off a sweet and tropical vibe. The heart of the fragrance features a mix of tobacco, tonka bean, and thyme oil, which creates a rich and spicy aroma. The base notes consist of cedar, oakmoss, and patchouli, which provide a woody and earthy finish to the fragrance. This scent is a great choice for those who love warm and comforting fragrances with a touch of exoticism.
TOP NOTES
coconut - rum - lentisque
HEART NOTES
tobacco - tonka bean - thyme oil - carrot
BASE NOTES
cedar- oakmoss - patchouli

perfumes_data.name: White Pearl The House of Oud for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: White Pearl by The House of Oud is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. White Pearl was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Cristian Calabro. Top notes are Ylang-Ylang, Pink Pepper and Cardamom; middle notes are Iris, Rose and Tonka Bean; base notes are Marine notes and Ambergris.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
White Pearl is inspired by the magnificent Akoya pearls that enchant with the wonder of roundness and shades of color, as well as the natural luster that makes them unique in the world. Pearls have always been synonymous with class and elegance, and Queen Elizabeth particularly loved them. Symbolizing the bond with these very special pearls Queen Elizabeth II’s historic piece of jewelry, the four-strand pearl choker the “Japanese Pearl Choker.” The pearl, one of the most precious gems, is a symbol of purity and innocence. A little treasure given to by the sea and it is precisely the marine notes that serve as the basis for an interweaving of ethereal floral notes and lively spices.
The fresh accord of Pink Pepper and Cardamom is masterfully interwoven with the fleshy floral bouquet of Ylang Ylang, Rose, and Iris. A blend capable of evoking the iridescent hues and smooth, polished texture of a precious white pearl. Perfumer is Cristian Calabro.
"The harmony of details and overall vision marks the moment of balance, from that moment the creative idea has form and identity." Cristina Mercaldo, Creative Director
White Pearl is available in the iconic bottle of 75ml and belongs to Royal Stones collection.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: "Maison Guerlain invites you to its new exceptional event in a numbered edition dedicated to the Chinese New Year. Each year, a new collaboration will celebrate the astrological sign of the Chinese calendar. Guerlain thus inaugurates the first edition with its 2024 vintage under the sign of the dragon, symbolizing the year to come. Dressed in red for the occasion, the legendary Flacon aux Abeilles is adorned with a sumptuous golden dragon adorned with Swarovski® crystals designed by Parisian jeweler Francesco Truscelli. This exceptional piece welcomes the powerful trail of Néroli Outrenoir in the image of the imperial dragon."

perfumes_data.name: A Drop d'Issey Essentielle Issey Miyake for women

perfumes_data.name: Sogno In Rosso Valentino for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Tinged with modernity by the spiciness of pepper, the creamy velvety Italian milk foam accord frees itself of its candor.
The hedonistic spirit of Roma in glass and light.
The rectangular glass bottle stands the true test of time. A transparency evincing that there is nothing to hide yet everything to discover. The studded cap made of glass echoes Maison Valentino’s signature emblem, the stud, a square and cruciform shape that pays homage to Rome and to the "bugnato" found on the Roman Palazzos. A recognizable insignia that has expressed the Maison’s identity over time.
The flacon is completed by a golden champagne spray button and the engraved VLogo. Echoing the fabric of Haute Couture boxes, each fragrance finds its name on the canvas fabric. A dimensional stud reflects each juice’s color at the base of the bottle.

perfumes_data.name: Candied Fantasy Britney Spears for women

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Candied Fantasy by Britney Spears is a sweet and floral fragrance designed for the sophisticated yet whimsical woman. Opening notes of bubblegum delight, juicy strawberry, and sparkling orange bring a deliciously decadent first impression. Pink hibiscus, jasmine sambac absolute, and lily of the valley highlight its floral core, surrounding you with a blissful embrace. Musk, sandalwood, and pink velvet cupcake accord deliver lingering hints of sweetness and warmth for a sensually playful finish.
Available in 100 ml Eau de Toilette.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Ariana Grande Angels Kiss is a new fragrance for women launched in 2024. This perfume opens with an unexpected, velvety combination of rich berries and rosewater gelato. The delicate blend of weightless musk and ethereal rose offers a creamy and floral contrast. Luminous amber and light woods add another layer of complexity, resulting in an unforgettable signature.
"A LOVENOTE from Ariana Grande to the world.
An elevated velvet-like addiction, the fragrance opens with an unexpected blend of rich berries and Rose Water Gelato. The delicate blend of Whipped Musks and Rose provides an unexpected creamy yet petally contrast that fills the fragrance with texture.
Luminous Oriental and Blonde Woods introduce yet another layer of beautiful complexity for an unforgettable signature.
Fragrance Notes
Top: Sparkling Raspberry, Coconut, Rose Water Gelato
Mid: Rose Petals, Whipped Musks
Base: Vanilla Bean, Blonde Woods, Luminous Oriental"

perfumes_data.name: Desert Dawn Byredo for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Desert Dawn by Byredo is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Desert Dawn was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jérôme Epinette. Top notes are Rose Petals and Cardamom; middle notes are Sandalwood, Cedarwood and Carrot Seeds; base notes are Musk, Papyrus, Silk and Vetiver.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Desert Dawn by Byredo is a celebration of nature’s creative juxtapositions, offering a universal take on the woody olfactive family. This scent opens with the inviting sweet spices of cardamom and rose petals, before giving way to the enveloping warmth of sandalwood, cedarwood, and carrot seeds at the heart. An enticing finish of vetiver and silk musk is enlivened by the crisp, clean scent of papyrus, invoking the dry heat of the desert and the warmness of the first rays of dawn.
Byredo Desert Dawn is available in 50 ml and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Absolue Oud Bouquet Lancôme for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Absolue Oud Bouquet by Lancôme is a Woody fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Absolue Oud Bouquet was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Fabrice Pellegrin.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Caressing a dark oud, the rose is soft but provocative. It is both brutal and warm, its unpredictability is addictive. Rich, dark, warm and dangerous. An intense and heady oud wood enveloped in a blanket of sweet praline and delicate rose. Like contemplating a starry night in the sky of the Domaine, at the height of summer.
The vision of the Master Perfumer, Fabrice Pellegrin:
"The first gourmet oud: a deliciously irresistible oud... This 'pleasure oud' awakens our senses with its addictive intensity and its epicurean signature."
THE DOMAIN OF THE ROSE: THE CULTURE OF AN INIMITABLE ROSE, ON THE EARTH WHERE NATURE LIVES IN THE WILD STATE
Discover Absolue Les Parfums, the first haute perfumery collection dedicated to the rose grown at the heart of our estate: the Centifolia Rose. Composed of 11 exceptional juices, it reveals an exclusive rose like you've never smelled before.
THE REINVENTION OF THE ICONIC INGREDIENT OF PERFUMERY
Our Master Perfumers have freed themselves from the classic olfactory pyramid and invented a new way of constructing a perfume with the halo construction. The rose becomes the heart of an olfactory symphony. Each perfume in the Absolue Les Parfums collection is born from the fusion of the exclusive Lancôme rose and an element of nature emblematic of the rose domain.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: A whimsical, rich, and fluffy treat inspired by choux à la crème pastry and chouchou, a term of endearment similar to “darling” from Alissa’s French upbringing.

perfumes_data.name: Or de Moi Infiniment Coty Paris for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Coty introduces Infiniment Coty Paris, its premium fragrance collection, conceived by CEO Sue Y Nabi and businessman Nicolas Vu, founders of Orveda skin care brand. Featuring 14 fragrances, the line uses Molecular Aura technology, capturing and releasing notes over time. Bottles are refillable, stackable, and reusable, with packaging that represents the letter ‘i’.
"Tuberose Flower Power. Potent, unapologetic radiance. More than a flower. Surpassing mere fragrance. Here is the epitome of exceptional, charisma shining forth in a flawless accord of floral-chypre*, balmy and full-bodied. In rich and in gold we glow.
Feel the beat from the tuberose.
An allegory of timelessness with tuberose and moss in evolving forms that echo through time.
Olfactory family: Sensual floral
Main ingredients: Tuberose – Chypre accord
Fragrance oil concentration: 20%"
Available in a 75ml Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Rose du Desert Houbigant for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Collection Les Ambres captures the most precious and emblematic elements of the Orient region through a sophisticated and contemporary olfactory alchemy. Inspired by the exceptional craftsmanship, cultural richness and unrivalled beauty of the Orient, this collection celebrates power and elegance through innovative and captivating olfactory compositions.
Created in four hands with Luca Maffei and Antoine Lie, each fragrance is a unique creation that blends multi-faceted amber with an avant-garde touch, offering a timeless sensory immersion.
Rose Du Desert Eau de Parfum by Houbigant, released in 2024, is classified as a unisex fragrance and belongs to the floral and oriental families. The composition opens with notes of bergamot, lemon blossom, and yuzu, leading to a heart of violet, iris, rose, and vanilla. The base includes cedar, musk, patchouli, and ambergris.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Ex Nihilo The Hedonist Extrait de Parfum is a new fragrance for women and men launched in 2024. This intense, lavish interpretation of the original creation opens with a refreshing blast of bergamot, luscious grapefruit, and spicy ginger. The heart is composed of the woody opulence of cedarwood and akigala wood with subtle undertones of lychee. The blend settles on the warmth of amberwood and tonka bean, along with dry patchouli and vetiver for added depth and character.

The scent reveals floral, ambery, and musky notes of truffle, pear, and oud combined with elemi, mimosa, and violet. It is underlined by the rich, raw, and authentic aspects of the LOEWE Accord—a new note based on the complex, resinous scent of the Spanish Rockrose wildflower.
Available in 50ml and 100ml EDP.

This fragrance opens with a zing of spicy lime and aldehydic cilantro leaves, followed by crisp watery notes. Fresh, green florals then emerge, leading to an intoxicating musky dry down. The scent offers a sensory experience that balances tranquility and vibrancy, reminiscent of forest bathing in El Bosque de Chapultepec or sipping mezcal in La Condesa.

Vanille des Afriques Intensivo is a balmy evening, enjoying the sunset whilst the warm breeze billows through your silks and linens. perfumes_data.detailed_description: Pur Lilas captures the feeling of being enveloped by nature. It's a piece of living high jewelry. With the freshest white lilac that's very lightly rose tinted, it gives the sensation of having a few lilac clusters wrapped around the neck. Alive, fresh and beautifully delicate.

perfumes_data.name: Sweet Tooth Cherry Baby Sabrina Carpenter for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Sweet Tooth Cherry Baby by Sabrina Carpenter is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Sweet Tooth Cherry Baby was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Gil Clavien. Top notes are Cherry, Brown sugar, Plum and Apple; middle notes are Dark Chocolate, Red Poppy, Vanilla Orchid and Peony; base notes are Cashmere Wood, Musk, Amber, Resin and Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Cherry Baby by Sabrina Carpenter is the third fragrance in her Sweet Tooth collection with Scent Beauty. This Eau De Parfum features a blend of cherry cosmo, glazed apple, plum nectar, brown sugar, red poppy, peony blossom, dark chocolate, vanilla orchid, cashmere wood, sensual musk, patchouli elixir, and amber resin. The fragrance is presented in a red, chocolate bar-shaped bottle, mirroring the design of the other perfumes in the collection.
"Cherry Baby: A Flirty, Addictive Fragrance
Let the indulgent aroma of cherries and chocolate envelop you, swirling in a flirty mist of red poppy and peony. Feel the addictive embrace of vanilla orchid and the whisper of sensual musk as it caresses your skin, leaving a trail of seduction in its wake."
Sabrina Carpenter said: “I wanted my new fragrance to be unexpected but something upscale and sophisticated while still feeling playful and provocative. Cherry Baby is timeless and flirty which encourages letting the sultry, glamorous side of you show in the best way possible.”
Available in 75 ml Eau de Parfum as a sa body mist.

perfumes_data.name: Jasmin de Toscane Jacques Fath for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Jasmin de Toscane by Jacques Fath is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Jasmin de Toscane was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Jean-Christophe Hérault. Top notes are Freesia, Grapefruit and Petitgrain; middle notes are Indian Jasmine, Jasmine Sambac and Italian Jasmine; base notes are Benzoin, Sinfonide and Hazelnut.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The fragrance is dedicated to a special variety of jasmine called Grand Duke de Toscane – a jasmine sambac variety with lush double and even triple flowers that resemble small white roses.
The perfumer assembled a jasmine accord from jasmine sambac absolute and jasmine grandiflorum absolute by IFF- LMR (Jasmine Absolute India LMR), noting that the Indian absolute, unlike others, smells cleaner and brighter, with fruity overtones, and is devoid of animalistic "dirtiness." In addition to the precious materials mentioned, the scent of the Grand Duke de Toscane flower itself, obtained using the headspace method, is added to the jasmine accord. This method is branded Living Flower at IFF. The fragrance truly gives the impression of a living flower rather than its extracted essence.

perfumes_data.name: Ivoire Pierre Balmain for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Ivoire by Balmain is a classic fragrance first introduced in 1979 and updated for the Les Éternels collection. This scent carries Balmain’s New French Style legacy into the future, encapsulating the optimism of modern Paris. It features an intoxicating grand tubéreuse de nuit entangled with untamed vetiver roots, creating a floral woody fragrance.

perfumes_data.name: L'Eau Rêvée D'Ikar Sisley for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: L'Eau Rêvée D'Ikar by Sisley is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. L'Eau Rêvée D'Ikar was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Vincent Ricord. Top notes are Lemon, Bitter Orange and Geranium; middle notes are Mastic or Lentisque, Iris and Pistachio; base notes are Vetiver, Labdanum and Sandalwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Dreams inspire our creativity; they surround us with images, memories, and sensations. Les Eaux Rêvées expresses this imagination, where inspirations from different generations come together, collide and complement each other - the d'Ornan family,
SISLEY. CRUSHED MASTIC PISTACHIOS
"The most wonderful of the stars became his downfall," wrote the poet Philippe Desportes in one of his beautiful interpretations of the myth of Icarus. Free and adventurous, the fragrance named in honor of Icarus, Rêvée d'Ikar, takes its inspiration from the shining sun, and proud and fresh landscapes of Corsica, one of the places that the d'Ornan family calls home. The essence of green mastic pistachio, an airy resinous shrub, combines with earthy vetiver to reveal warm, unexpected notes. A powerful and seductive aroma.
Top notes: bitter orange, lemon, geranium
Middle notes: pistachio, iris, mastic
Base notes: sandalwood, labdanum, vetiver

perfumes_data.name: L'Eau Kenzo pour Femme Sunlight Edition Limitée Kenzo for women
perfumes_data.short_description: L'Eau Kenzo pour Femme Sunlight Edition Limitée by Kenzo is a Floral Aquatic fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. L'Eau Kenzo pour Femme Sunlight Edition Limitée was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Cresp. Top note is Lemon; middle notes are Lotus and Osmanthus; base note is Cedar.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
L'EAU KENZO for Women Sunlight Limited Edition Eau de Toilette 50ml
KENZO PARFUMS introduces its new fragrance for women, L'Eau Kenzo Sunlight Limited Edition.
L'EAU KENZO continues to draw inspiration from abundant nature. Capturing the scents of flowers, fruits, freshness, and happiness, KENZO seizes this sun-drenched and colorful water for a rendezvous with the skin. Twenty-seven years after the launch of L'EAU Kenzo Pour Femme, Olivier Cresp reinterprets his iconic creation. This new eau de toilette is characterized by a generous bouquet of lotus flowers, uplifted by light lemon notes resting on a base of cedarwood. The smooth, velvety notes of osmanthus flowers infuse the fragrance with its Japanese origins.
The formula contains 92.5% natural ingredients*, aligning this new Eau de Toilette for women with our vision of a more beautiful world. The L'Eau Kenzo bottle reflects one of nature's essential elements: water. Its vertical design pays tribute to the strength of this incredible life source. Committed to a more beautiful world, the L'Eau Kenzo Sunlight Limited Edition for Women bottle contains 15% recycled glass.

perfumes_data.name: Vietnamese Coffee d'Annam for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Vietnamese Coffee by d'Annam is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vietnamese Coffee was launched in 2023. Vietnamese Coffee was created by Anh Ngo and IFF. Top note is Coffee; middle notes are Dark Chocolate, Condensed Milk and Lily of the Valley; base notes are Tonka Bean, Amber and Cedarwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Vietnamese Coffee EDP honors Vietnam's delightful brew, crafted from dark-roasted Robusta beans, which exude a bold, caramel-chocolate richness and a pronounced bitterness that harmonizes exquisitely with creamy condensed milk. Topped with ice, it becomes the iconic drink known as ""Cà Phê Sữa Đá"", the perfect way to start the day for most Vietnamese.
Gender: Unisex
Top Notes: Roasted Coffee
Heart Notes: Dark Chocolate, Condensed Milk, Muguet
Base Notes: Tonka Bean, Oriental, Cedarwood

perfumes_data.name: Flower by Kenzo La Récolte Parisienne Kenzo for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Flower by Kenzo La Récolte Parisienne by Kenzo is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Flower by Kenzo La Récolte Parisienne was launched in 2024. Flower by Kenzo La Récolte Parisienne was created by Alberto Morillas and Dora Baghriche. Top notes are Pink Pepper and Yellow Mandarin; middle notes are Dahlia and Damask Rose; base notes are White Musk, Tonka Bean and Vanilla.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Flower By Kenzo La Récolte Parisienne is announced as a radiant Eau de Parfum that combines the iconic urban poppy with the flowers that grow freely in the Parisian fields. The fragrance brings new vitality to Kenzo's iconic Eau de Parfum.
Perfumers Alberto Morillas and Dora Baghriche visit the Masami flower farm to capture the olfactory notes of the Dahlia, the emblematic flower of the countryside. Using headspace technology, which allows the natural aromatic compounds exhaled by the flowers to be collected under a glass dome, dahlias release their aromas in a pure state, intact and wild, so that perfumers can recreate them with a natural and spontaneous olfactory identity.
Its signature, a subtle blend of Rosa Damascena and White Musks, opens to fresh new facets: the acidity of bright yellow mandarin, the spiciness of a pink Dahlia accord, and the sweetness of Tonka Bean.
Top notes: Yellow mandarin essence, Pink pepper extract
Heart notes: Dahlia, Rosa Damascena Essence
Base Notes: Vanilla, White Musk, Tonka Bean
Available in 40 and 75 ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Magnolia Grandiflora is a grandiose evergreen tree whose traces can be found also in the prehistoric era. It questions our notion of time with its unusual ability to pass through times, to adapt to different environments, and to preserve its one-of-a-kind individuality. A rare talent that reminds of Officina Profumo-Farmaceutica di Santa Maria Novella’s own history. An awe-inspiring exemplar of Magnolia Grandiflora also graces the facade of Villa Medici di Castello: this species arrived in Florence in the 18th century, and it was soon grown in the Medici's family possessions.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Jimmy Choo Blossom Special Edition 2023 is a rounded fruity floral aroma, created as a celebration of Spring. For the 2023 Edition of Blossom perfume Jimmy Choo combined floral and fruity woody aromas with bright edible fruits, such as Raspberry. Jimmy Choo Blossom Special Edition 2023 perfume begins with sweet exotic fruits, such as Mandarin Orange, Mango and Grapefruit. These are delicately layered over a floral heart dominated by the key note of Frangipani Flower with Jasmine and Raspberry to brighten. The simple woody base of Sandalwood offers a perfect balance between elegance and warmth, for a beautiful and joyful Spring and Summer fragrance by Jimmy Choo perfumes.

perfumes_data.name: Vanilla Suede Ariana Grande for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Vanilla Suede by Ariana Grande is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Vanilla Suede was launched in 2024. Top note is Bergamot; middle notes are Milk, Rice and Sandalwood; base notes are Vanilla and Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Vanilla Suede by Ariana Grande is a richly sensorial fragrance that delivers an incredibly edible and delectable, almost veil-like sensuality. The top teases with sparkling notes, while the heart reveals intimate warmth with Creamy Sandalwood and Rice Milk. The base of Vanilla Beans and Liquid Musks further enhances the cocooning sensuality and skin-like appeal.
"LOVENOTES Vanilla Suede
Lush. Sensuous. Exotic.
Introducing Vanilla Suede, a richly sensorial fragrance.
A LOVENOTE from Ariana Grande to the world, exclusively available in the UK.
An irresistible beautiful second skin feeling, the fragrance delivers an incredibly edible and delectable, almost veil like sensuality. The top teases with an introduction of sparkling notes, but the essential story of intimate warmth starts to emerge in the heart from the Creamy Sandalwood and Rice Milk. The Vanilla Beans and Liquid Musks in the back further push this story bringing more cocooning sensuality and a skin-like appeal.
Fragrance Notes
Top: Italian Bergamot
Mid: Creamy Sandalwood, Rice Milk
Base: Vanilla Beans, Liquid Musks"

perfumes_data.name: The Mariner's Rhyme Francesca Bianchi for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: The Mariner's Rhyme by Francesca Bianchi is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. The Mariner's Rhyme was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Francesca Bianchi. Top notes are elemi, Bergamot, Grapefruit and Lavender; middle notes are Ozonic notes, Iris and Orange Blossom; base notes are Oakmoss, Frankincense, Patchouli and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The ozonic theme corresponds to the style and artistic vision of Francesca Bianchi. The perfume has a fresh and cheerful aspect, but also complex and dramatic. The ozonic accord works thanks to the strong presence of amber. The transparency of the ozonic chord is converted into an opaque and iris into an opaque and dense note by the iris and has an almost sacred and mystical character evoked by elemi and incense.
This unisex fragrance is fresh and transparent on the one hand and dense and structured on the other. The citrus and ozonic opening has a crisp and modern character, enhanced by the sharp edge of the aldehydes.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: On a hot summer’s day, take a morning stroll by the majestic collegiate and down the narrow historic streets of the town. From the market stalls wafts a delicious scent of freshly-picked aromatic herbs: mint and bergamot, with its distinctly lemony aroma, the crisp, green notes of eucalyptus leaves and fig mingled with the honeyed fragrance of spicy ginger, sun-drenched Arabian jasmine and herbaceous maté. The fresh, invigorating scent lingers on the skin for a long time.

perfumes_data.name: Absolue 6AM Rose Lancôme for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Absolue 6AM Rose by Lancôme is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Absolue 6AM Rose was launched in 2024. Absolue 6AM Rose was created by Fanny Bal and Dominique Ropion.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
At dawn, the first rays of the sun are reflected on the morning dew, the rose shines with its lily of the valley accord. She is as optimistic as a new day. She dances alongside the Domaine’s jasmine. Clean and bright, fresh and floral, it reminds us of the endless possibilities available to us.
The vision of Master Perfumers Fanny Bal & Dominique Ropion:
"This composition is clear as morning dew. A pure, delicate and sunny rose, shaped instinctively."
THE DOMAIN OF THE ROSE: THE CULTURE OF AN INIMITABLE ROSE, ON THE EARTH WHERE NATURE LIVES IN THE WILD STATE
Discover Absolue Les Parfums, the first collection of high perfumery dedicated to the rose grown at the heart of our estate: the Centifolia Rose. Composed of 11 exceptional juices, it reveals an exclusive rose like you've never smelled before.
THE REINVENTION OF THE ICONIC INGREDIENT OF PERFUMERY
Our Master Perfumers have freed themselves from the classic olfactory pyramid and invented a new way of constructing a perfume with the construction of the halo. The rose becomes the heart of an olfactory symphony. Each fragrance in the Absolue Les Parfums collection is born from the fusion of Lancôme's exclusive rose and an element of nature emblematic of the rose domain.

By combining its fruity, floral, and woody notes with unexpected ingredients, the unique fragrance reflects all the facets of the fruit, from its juicy flesh to its fuzzy touch and woody core." -Brand website.

perfumes_data.name: Eau de Rochas Orange Horizon Rochas for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Eau de Rochas Orange Horizon by Rochas is a Citrus fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Eau de Rochas Orange Horizon was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Sophie Labbé. Top notes are Blood Orange, Tangerine and Bitter Orange; middle notes are Jasmine Sambac, Magnolia and Basil; base notes are White Musk, Ambrofix™ and Cedar.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
SECOND ENCOUNTER
Eau de Rochas Orange Horizon, a Citrus Floral Woody scent, the second encounter, celebrating a Riviera emblematic ingredient. This eau de toilette invites you on a perfumed getaway, around a sparkling and succulent blood orange.
ORANGE, THE STAR INGREDIENT
Inspired by the captivating sight of a sunset on the Amalfi Coast, Eau de Rochas Orange Horizon reveals a fresh and sunny composition of Italian blood oranges illuminated by the femininity of Jasmine Sambac and the essence of Basil. In the background, the enveloping creaminess of cedarwood and white musk reveal its irresistible fragrance. A bright citrus floral fragrance that combines freshness and sensuality, like a delicate caress on the skin.
CONTINUITY
An elegant and modern bottle, tinted with a pop and sparkling orange, twisting the iconic codes of Eau de Rochas into a colorful and decidedly contemporary variation.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Dreams inspire our creativity, they surround us with images, memories and sensations. Les Eaux Rêvées expresses this imagination, where inspirations from different generations come together, collide and complement each other - the d'Ornan family, SISLEY.
IRISES BETWEEN WATER AND ICE
If the fragrance Rêvée d'Alma were a picture hanging on the wall, it would reflect the French countryside with rivers, ponds and reeds. In the aroma, you can feel the depth of silky clear fresh water, which grabs and awakens you like a crystal song. The combination of delicate watery irises and icy cardamom transforms Rêvée d'Alma into a pure and joyful aroma.
Top notes: basil, bergamot, icy cardamom
Middle notes: water iris, jasmine, rose
Base notes: cedar, patchouli, vetiver

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Maison Crivelli presents Oud Cadenza, an extrait de parfum developed in collaboration with perfumer Jordi Fernandez. Inspired by Thibaud Crivelli's personal adventure of smelling oud at a hidden party in a palm grove, this fragrance features a surprising contrast of oud with a date and toasted cane sugar accord.
"Oud Cadenza Extrait de parfum
The defining adventure: smelling oud while attending a hidden party in a palm grove.

The surprising contrast: oud contrasts with a date and toasted cane sugar accord.

Fragrance family: gourmand woody (vegan).

Key raw materials: cardamom oil from India ORPUR, cinnamon bark oil, saffron, oud wood accord, davana oil from India OPRUR, cocoa butter absolute ORPUR, vanilla extract from Madagascar ORPUR, patchouli oil from Indonesia ORPUR, toasted tonka bean absolute from Venezuela ORPUR, myrrh.

The ORPUR label brings together the finest natural perfume ingredients from the Givaudan perfume house."

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Akro presents Rise, the new Eau de Parfum, in late summer 0f 2023.  This is a fragrance that celebrates the pleasures of summer in every season. The inspiration lies in days spent at the beach, a cocktail, and a festival under the stars.
The composition opens with sweet notes of coconut water and tart pineapple accents reminiscent of the Piňa Colada cocktail. It mixes toffee and tiare flowers and closes with sandalwood.
Available as a 100ml Eau de Parfum.

The nose behind this fragrance is Cristian Calabro. Top notes are Wild Strawberry, Black Cherry and Champagne; middle notes are Lipstick, Rose and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Vanilla, Benzoin and Cedarwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: The crazy ingredient lights us up: lipstick. Guilty Crush dresses in transgression and projects us into a universe where everything is allowed. An intriguing fragrance capable of recreating the unmistakable scent of lipstick. A touch of color on the lips and it is immediately charm, confidence and positivity, we wear it and feel free to pursue our desires, indulge our instincts and live our emotions, without regrets. A composition with an enveloping creaminess, in which the scarlet notes of black cherry and wild strawberry blend with champagne, in a seductive cocktail, and alternate with the voluptuous petals of rose and jasmine and then explode into a base of warm and intoxicating scents.

perfumes_data.name: Oudgasm Café Oud | 19 Eau de Parfum Intense Kayali Fragrances for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Oudgasm Café Oud | 19 Eau de Parfum Intense by Kayali Fragrances is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oudgasm Café Oud | 19 Eau de Parfum Intense was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Hamid Merati-Kashani. Top notes are Cappuccino, Bergamot and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Geranium and Rose; base notes are Oud, White Musk, Vanilla and Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: "I have always believed that perfume is (synonymous with) pleasure. I named the collection Oudgasm because I wanted something that was just as bold as the juices themselves! Out of all the fragrance notes in the world, oud has always given me this incredibly euphoric feeling that is both transformative and transportive - as if it exists in its own universe. My love for oud turned into passion once I moved to the Middle East over 20 years ago where I truly embraced the ritual of layering with it as an act of self expression and self love. The intensity, the richness and the beauty of this ingredient can tell so many stories - so when I started working on Oudgasm, I knew it couldn’t be bottled in just one fragrance! I wanted to explore oud and all of its brilliant facets in hopes that, you too, will fall in love." - Mona Kattan

perfumes_data.name: Suite 302 Victoria Beckham Beauty for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Suite 302 by Victoria Beckham Beauty is a Leather fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Suite 302 was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Jérôme Epinette. Top notes are Black Cherry and Red Pepper; middle notes are Violet and Rose; base notes are Black Leather and Tobacco.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
An alluring rendezvous. An entrancing escapade. The intoxicating parfum of glamour. Victoria Beckham conjures the sumptuous spirit of whirlwind weekends in Paris in the memory of Suite 302: An erotic mélange of black cherry and red peppercorn; dimmed hotel rooms clouded in rose centifolia, midnight violet and narcotic musk; plush velvets saturated with papyrus, black leather and masculine tobacco leaf.

Suite 302 embodies intoxicating glamour, a deep and confident love, wrapped up in the sumptuous memory of Victoria and David's whirlwind anniversary trips to Paris. What adventure: the seduction swirls from dimmed hotel rooms clouded with bold florals and spicy peppercorn to intimate walks of the city's winding streets at midnight, imbued with a trail of smoky masculine notes.

Each responsibly-crafted fragrance is bottled in a flacon inspired by a vintage parfum bottle Victoria collected while traveling. The white enamel of the Suite 302 bottle is reminiscent of the little white Roberto Cavalli dress Victoria wore for her surprise vow renewal with David.
"This fragrance captures the memories of David and I in Paris. This is the city we sneak off to, it is always our happy place, whether for an occasional weekend, or a birthday, or anniversary, I’ve always felt a natural connection to Paris." xVB

perfumes_data.name: Infinity Montale for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Infinity by Montale is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Infinity was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top notes are Black Cherry, Plum, Saffron, Pink Pepper and Cardamom; middle notes are Oud, Leather, Sandalwood, Rose, Vetiver and Tuberose; base notes are Tobacco Leaf, Vanilla Sugar, Tonka, Amber and Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"There can be no mistaking his deep gaze. His eyes are fixated to the intangible and he moves forward peacefully. At first sight, this piquant character pulls you in. The brightness of his smile, and the pink Pepper come to pick you up. Cross his path and you immediately turn away from your routine. The space around him becomes his, permeated by a purple wave of Plum and black Cherry that whisper of its sweet origin and touch your soul.
It’s a beautiful summer, a summer echoing its temperance and made of the sun’s caresses under the light sheets, of fresh Flowers opening in the morning and of starry nights in the souvenir of the scorching day.
The soft Indian Rose gently balances the Leather and black Oud in a semi-hypnotic pendulum where Sandalwood and Vanilla mingle without excess. You are touching a rare, ambered and deeply oriental feeling, a sensation whose genesis you would not know: who from the message or the messenger, who from the wake one has been left in or its wearer? Who from the top note or the heart will take you to your own immensity?
It doesn’t matter, because in the end, all roads lead to Infinity." - Montale
NOTES
Black Cherry, Plum, Peruvian Pink Pepper, Cardamom & Saffron.
Black Oud & Leather, Indian Rose & Solar Tuberose, Sandalwood & Vetiver.
Vanilla Sugar, Intense Oriental, Tobacco Leaves, Tonka Beans & Musk.
