perfumes_data.detailed_description: Rouge Eau de Parfum by Balmain draws inspiration from Pierre Balmain and Olivier Rousteing’s deep connection to the allure of stardom and success. Housed in a passion-red bottle, this fragrance features an electrifying floral fruity bouquet with radiant woods. As the sun sets, sensual lily, exotic moraea ciliata, and fruity apricot-like osmanthus combine, culminating in warm and radiant georgywood with ylang-ylang.

perfumes_data.name: Clary Sage Edizione Millesimata Trussardi for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Clary Sage Edizione Millesimata by Trussardi is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Clary Sage Edizione Millesimata was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Julie Massé. Top notes are Grapefruit and Clary Sage; middle notes are Balsam Fir, Myrtle and Hemlock; base notes are Ambrettolide, Orcanox™ and Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Clary Sage Eau de Parfum Intense is a fantastic journey outside and inside us: it is walking on an imaginary path that reconnects us to nature, offering a sweeping bird's-eye view of everything and simultaneously profound introspection within ourselves. It is a tribute to one’s ability to disengage from a physical place — such as a frenetic city like Milan — and the present.  It is knowing how to be on the "Streets of Milan" yet in an abstract ‘elsewhere’. To create this transcendental effect, perfumer Julie Massé harmonized a bouquet of essences with a woody scent known in ancient medicinal wisdom for their relaxing and invigorating power. Clary Sage Eau de Parfum Intense has a charismatic personality that takes advantage of the presence of an extraordinary millèsime  ingredient, the concrete of Blue Hemlock, a conifer with greenish-blue reflections and fresh, vigorous notes able to convey an extraordinary relaxing effect.

Clary Sage has a bright and energetic overture that comes from the semi-sweet, tart notes of grapefruit essential oil and those of Clary Sage [Salvia Sclarea], famous in phytotherapy for its healing, if not salvific, properties, as the Latin name infers. In perfumery it is loved for its fresh, spicy and herbaceous olfactory imprint. Furthermore, Sclareol is extracted through the steam distillation of Clary Sage leaves and flowers, whose aromatic and woody notes add depth and complexity to the fragrance and also help improve its persistence. In the heart notes, we find the millèsime ingredient, Blue Hemlock concrete, whose vibrant, aromatic notes instill a feeling of relaxation and a desire to merge with nature. The woody accord is completed by the fresh, spicy notes of Balsam Fir Absolute, which invite mental clarity, and the sweet and luminous notes of Myrtle. Finally, the essence of Patchouli with its magical and aphrodisiacal notes enriches the fragrance. To fix the bouquet, two synthetic molecules were used: Vegan Ambrettolide, a synthetic molecule with delicate musky notes that increases the persistence of the fragrance, and Orcanox™ — synthesized from Sclareol — replacing ambergris of animal origin with fixative properties and powdery, sensual notes.
Julie Massé: “I wanted to create something unusual and provocative, strong enough to induce a dizzying sense of pleasure in which the unexpected note of Hemlock meets an enveloping note of Balsam Fir and a hypnotic note of Clary Sage.”
TOP NOTES: Grapefruit Essential Oil, Clary Sage Essential Oil
HEART NOTES: Myrtle Essential Oil, Hemlock Concrete, Balsam Fir Absolute                                 
BASE NOTES: Vegan Ambrettolide, Patchouli Essential Oil, Orcanox ™
OLFACTIVE FAMILY: Woody / Aromatic / Addictive

Sogni is the realisation of my desire, an immediate experience, incredibly close to reality and the nature of things. Aesthetic devotion to nature.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"Enter another dimension with Nina Illusion, the new conscious and vegan feminine Eau de Parfum by Nina Ricci. A colourful fragrance that invites you to escape the ordinary and experience the extraordinary.
Prepare to be delighted by the unexpected nature of this remarkable Eau de Parfum. Infused with a charming touch of enchantment, thischypre fruity floral fragrance beckons you to delve into its extraordinary world and reveal your magic.

Nina Illusion surprises as the softness of orange blossom intertwines with the tantalizing tang of raspberry, while velvety patchouli brings tender warmth. Together, they conjure an olfactory spell that mesmerizes the senses, inviting you to experience the illusion."
"Nina Illusion immerses you in a colorful world infused with a touch of magic. We blended soft orange blossom with effervescent raspberry and creamy patchouli to create this captivating and addictive new Eau de Parfum." – Olivier Cresp, Master Perfumer – Nicolas Bonneville, Perfumer
"The iconic Nina apple-shaped bottle glistens with bold iridescent pink, reflecting reality in a lens of rose-tinted enchantment.

Affixed with a vibrant green satin ribbon is a precious pink flower jewel designed by Hugo Kreit—to be worn as a choker, bracelet or ring. The box reveals hidden surprises within: a surreal illustration by artist Jeanine Brito, who has worked alongside Harris Reed for Nina Ricci fashion, and a message written inside for you to discover."
Available in 30, 50 and 80 ml Eau de Parfum.

A sensory journey delving into our emotions, Paperplane embodies wonder, the realization of dreams, and the illusion of suspended movement in the recesses of the mind.
This is a delicate "clean" scent that evokes the image of a graceful paper airplane hovering in the air. It displays transparent notes of cotton flowers combined with musk, vetiver and amber, with a whiff of incense.
Crafted by perfumer Dominique Moellhausen, the fragrance features notes of cotton flower, incense, pepper, musk, cypriol, sage, vetiver, and amber.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The Merchant of Venice reminiscents of ancient times when pharaohs lived in grand palaces and lived luxuriously. The Queen of The Night Eau de Parfum starts with spicy notes of saffron and cinnamon, evoking the bustling bazaars of that era. As it delves deeper, it evolves into the comforting scents of incense and amber, creating a warm and sensual atmosphere, ultimately leading to the balanced blend of tonka bean and sandalwood.
Queen of the Night is a lavish fragrance that pays tribute to the opulence of timeless royalty. It takes inspiration from Kiphy, the traditional Egyptian perfume, but adds a modern twist, in line with The Merchant of Venice's approach of blending historical recipes with innovative elements.
Top notes: Blue lotus, Saffron, Cinnamon bark
Middle notes: Kyphi accord, Incense, Oriental
Base notes: Sandalwood, Tonka bean, Myrrh
Available as a 100ml Eau de Parfum.

This fragrance contains Orpur™ quality Tuberose Absolute, Red Ginger, Mandarin Oil and Patchouli Oil.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: White Milk is an inspired expression of Bianco Latte by Giardini Di Toscana. perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Bath & Body Works Sweet Petal Pound Cake Fine Fragrance Mist is a scent that combines floral and fruity notes for a sweet and invigorating aroma. Bath & Body Works is a well-known brand that specializes in body care products, and this fragrance mist is no exception. The fragrance mist is a fine mist spray that can be used all over the body for a long-lasting scent experience.
The fragrance notes of Bath & Body Works Sweet Petal Pound Cake Fine Fragrance Mist include candied rose, raspberry swirl, and frosted bundt cake. These notes combine to create a scent that smells like the perfect swirl of fruity and floral. The candied rose note adds a touch of sweetness to the fragrance, while the raspberry swirl note adds a fruity aroma. The frosted bundt cake note brings a warm and comforting smell to the mix. Overall, this fragrance is best described as a Floral Fruity scent .

perfumes_data.name: Dodo Jackfruit Edition Zoologist Perfumes for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Dodo Jackfruit Edition by Zoologist Perfumes is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Dodo Jackfruit Edition was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Yves Cassar. Top notes are Jackfruit, Turmeric, Bergamot and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Lavender, Turmeric, Orange Blossom, Geranium and Orris; base notes are Tonka Bean, Sandalwood, Vetiver, Patchouli and Labdanum.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The sun sparkled across rippling waves, its morning dance upon the Indian Ocean rousing the dodos from their carefree slumber. Stumbling drunkenly across the forest floor they feasted on overripe fruit where it lay, dropped for them by the lush island paradise that nurtured them. For generations, the predator-free and bountiful shores lulled them into such a state of complacency that their wings grew idle, and flight was lost – even to memory. Ultimately evolution would betray them, but while it lasted, the dodos enjoyed an existence marked by ease and comfort.
In Zoologist Dodo, notes of jackfruit and bergamot border a winding path dappled with aromatic turmeric and pink pepper. Venture along it to the heart of an island forest where hints of powdery orris emerge from beneath a potpourri of lavender, geranium, and orange flower. Soothed by the comforting florals, you’ll soon surrender, sinking into the loam where woody tonka and sandalwood sprout from an earthy base of patchouli and vetiver.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Discover Taskeen Lactea Divina - a fragrance where milky elegance meets floral opulence. Opening with a touch of velvety cocoa and a whisper of incense, this scent unveils a heart of lush jasmine and creamy tuberose, casting a spell of floral radiance. As it settles, warm milk, rich vanilla, and comforting tonka bean create an embrace of soft indulgence. Lactea Divina is more than a perfume; it’s an experience of serene beauty and timeless grace, crafted for those who cherish the gentle and the divine.

Experience the vibrant energy of New York's Lower East Side with DKNY's Be Delicious Orchard Street Eau de Parfum, a lively fruity-floral fragrance inspired by the dynamic urban landscape.
Radiating with vitality, the scent opens with the crispness of pink lady apple mingled with the zesty sparkle of pink grapefruit, creating a stimulating and refreshing burst. The heart reveals a blend of elegant jasmine and velvety orris, contrasting with the lush sweetness of black raspberry and the tang of pomegranate, embodying the multifaceted allure of femininity. The base notes of cedarwood and leather add a rich, textured depth that mirrors the intricate layers of New York City.

perfumes_data.name: Absolue I Flamed A Rose Lancôme for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Absolue I Flamed A Rose by Lancôme is a Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Absolue I Flamed A Rose was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Daphné Bugey.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Burning with fiery fire, the rose is fearless and dangerous. Combined with deep patchouli, it becomes indomitable. Her defiant spirit is matched only by her legendary beauty. Meeting deep, masculine vetiver, perfectly paired with earthy patchouli, our rose is sensual yet balanced and harmonious.
The vision of the Master Perfumer, Daphné Bugey:
"Between elegance and carnal extravagance, a rose dressed in the depths of woods and amber... I was inspired by the duality of the rose, between its elegance and its sensuality."
THE DOMAIN OF THE ROSE: THE CULTURE OF AN INIMITABLE ROSE, ON THE EARTH WHERE NATURE LIVES IN THE WILD STATE
Discover Absolue Les Parfums, the first haute perfumery collection dedicated to the rose grown at the heart of our estate: the Centifolia Rose. Composed of 11 exceptional juices, it reveals an exclusive rose like you've never smelled before.
THE REINVENTION OF THE ICONIC INGREDIENT OF PERFUMERY
Our Master Perfumers have freed themselves from the classic olfactory pyramid and invented a new way of constructing a perfume with the halo construction. The rose becomes the heart of an olfactory symphony. Each perfume in the Absolue Les Parfums collection is born from the fusion of the exclusive Lancôme rose and an element of nature emblematic of the rose domain.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Isola Blu is a five-star vacation captured in a fragrance; just one spritz of this sophisticated citrus perfume surrounds you in the scent of endless summer.
“Luminous Citrus notes shine upon warm Oriental and Pink Pepper, feeling like a day spent beneath the Mediterranean sun. A coastal breeze billows across a verdant lemon grove as fresh Herbs an juicy Fruits freshen a garden of green, earthy notes. Bringing an indulgent quality, creamy Champaca, Jasmine and Coconut melt into a hint of leather - a nod to fine Italian craftmanship.” - ROJA DOVE.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Patchouli Ardent is a luminous and captivating reinterpretation of patchouli. Traditionally woody, dark, and mysterious, it reveals its most radiant facets on contact with rose and a majestic leather and musk accord. This fragrance is part of the Absolus Allegoria collection, which celebrates deep and powerful nature revealed by striking contrasts by moonlight.

perfumes_data.name: Coco Paradise Bath & Body Works for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Coco Paradise by Bath & Body Works is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Coco Paradise was launched in 2023.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Bath & Body Works Coco Paradise Fine Fragrance Mist is a luxurious fragrance that transports the wearer to a tropical paradise. The brand is known for its high-quality bath and body products, and this fragrance is no exception. The concentration of the fragrance mist is fine, which means that it is lightweight and perfect for everyday wear.
The fragrance features notes of salted coconut monoi, sugared neroli, and bronzed sandalwood. When combined, these notes create a warm, sweet, and soothing scent reminiscent of a sunny island getaway. The salted coconut monoi note adds a creamy, tropical element to the fragrance, while the sugared neroli provides a sweet, floral touch. The bronzed sandalwood note gives the fragrance a rich, earthy foundation. Overall, Bath & Body Works Coco Paradise Fine Fragrance Mist belongs to the Floral Fruity olfactory group.

perfumes_data.name: A Parfum Ann Demeulemeester for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: A Parfum by Ann Demeulemeester is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. A Parfum was launched in 2023. Top notes are Cloves, Calabrian bergamot, Ceylon Cinnamon, Cumin and Sicilian Lemon; middle notes are Leather, May Rose, Birch Tar and Jasmine; base notes are Patchouli, Sandalwood, Vetiver and Palisander Rosewood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The elemental fragrance of Ann Demeulemeester centres around the cypher A, the designer’s initial and the first letter of the alphabet. A symbol founded in core and constancy, it is employed to signify the essence of an expression: a visual and emotional language distilled into a singular genderless parfum.

Crafted personally by Ann Demeulemeester through a lifelong instinctive study of notes and associations, the fragrance transmits the poetic purity and structural serenity of the designer’s enduring oeuvre. It is a unique and intriguing composition embodied by the primordial and mysterious obscurities of nature.

Created from instinct, it is a beguiling fragrance refined from ingredients in their rarest, purest form. This perfume was created from essential oils derived from the cold pressing of the finest quality of natural, raw materials.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Artist Andrea Maack launches Jest in March 2024.
"JEST is that happy state that carries us into the moment where the soft, warm spring seems right around the corner. Along this exhilarating path of exploration, the sweetness of the plum and apple soon gives way to the feverish power of the Rhum and chocolate. An experience of all senses that the smooth vanilla and the wild musk enrich with their earthy envelope."
Created by perfumer Julien Rasquinet, this 'sweet boozy' fragrance also features cardamom, heliotrope, and ambroxan notes.
Available in a 50 ml Extrait de Parfum.

The irresistible fusion of soft citrus and watery florals bloom into the lingering veil of glowing amber and velvety musk that embrace you in an irresistible aura. Ignite your Soft Spot.

Cheirosa 87 Perfume Mist evokes the sizzling Copacabana Beach culture of 1987, when the "Summer of the Cans" influenced parties, music, and art. The scent opens with a blend of mandarin, cardamom, and incense, leading into a heart of tea, lilac, jasmine, violet, orris, and sunflower. perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Pressed Petals is an enchantingly feminine fragrance introduced by LOVENOTES. This multi-dimensional floral scent opens with an inviting blend of Bergamot and Italian Lemon, transforming into a beautiful story of rich Violet Leaf and Jasmine Petals, paired with the sweetness of Raspberry. The fragrance unfolds with Sandalwood, Oriental, and Marshmallow, bringing in a creamy and delectable warmth.
"LOVENOTES Pressed Petals
Floral. Magical. Romantic.
Introducing Pressed Petals, an enchantingly feminine fragrance.
A LOVENOTE from Ariana Grande to the world, coming soon exclusively to Australia.
A multi-dimensional floral that is incredibly captivating, this fragrance opens with an inviting blend of Bergamot and Italian Lemon. The fragrance quickly transforms into a beautiful story of rich Violet Leaf and Jasmine Petals, paired with the sweetness of Raspberry adding alluring depth.  A new layer unfolds with the Sandalwood, Oriental and Marshmallow bringing in a creamy and delectable warmth and signature richness.
Fragrance Notes
Top: Bergamot, Italian Lemon
Mid: Violet Leaf, Raspberry, Jasmine Petals
Base: Sandalwood, Pink Oriental, Marshmallow"

perfumes_data.name: Absolue 1001 Roses Lancôme for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Absolue 1001 Roses by Lancôme is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Absolue 1001 Roses was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Louise Turner.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Every morning in May, the rose is freshly picked. Revealing petal by petal, its purest fragrance.
1001 Roses Eau de Parfum is a kaleidoscope of roses, the original emblem of our Domaine de la Rose. Its fresh, vibrant juice represents the freshness of a freshly picked rose.
Full of nuance, depth and contrast, the classic notes of rose come to life under the spring sun.
The vision of the Master Perfumer, Louise Turner:
"The quintessence of the rose, more magnified than ever, natural and anchored in modernity. [...] 1001 Roses celebrates the emblematic Rose of Lancôme, a plural Rose with modern, fresh and airy flowering, represented through all its faces and all its facets."
THE DOMAIN OF THE ROSE: THE CULTURE OF AN INIMITABLE ROSE, ON THE EARTH WHERE NATURE LIVES IN THE WILD STATE
Discover Absolue Les Parfums, the first haute perfumery collection dedicated to the rose grown at the heart of our estate: the Centifolia Rose. Composed of 11 exceptional juices, it reveals an exclusive rose like you've never smelled before.
THE REINVENTION OF THE ICONIC INGREDIENT OF PERFUMERY
Our Master Perfumers have freed themselves from the classic olfactory pyramid and invented a new way of constructing a perfume with the halo construction. The rose becomes the heart of an olfactory symphony. Each perfume in the Absolue Les Parfums collection is born from the fusion of the exclusive Lancôme rose and an element of nature emblematic of the rose domain.

In the moonlight, the rose becomes hypnotic. Imagine a rose that has bloomed and thrived under the bright light of the moon, almost cold, mineral and mysterious. Enveloped in deep notes of sandalwood and sweetness of rose, it transports the mind and senses to a mystical state of inner peace.

Emanuel Ungaro Cosmic is an amber floral fragrance for women that combines classic femininity with contemporary themes of escapism and futuristic appeal. It features a blend of fruity, floral, and spicy notes, creating a scent that captures the essence of both modernity and timeless elegance.
"This fragrance captures classic femininity, combining it with contemporary themes of escapism and futuristic appeal. Driven by her vision and determination, the EMANUEL UNGARO COSMIC woman explores the world, discovering the vast potential that lies dormant within her. Her adventurous spirit and innate confidence drive her to reach for the stars and manifest limitless possibilities. With EMANUEL UNGARO COSMIC, the world is yours."
"Inspired by Emanuel Ungaro's futuristic "Space Age" fashion from the 1960s, EMANUEL UNGARO COSMIC features a planet-shaped bottle with an elegantly integrated cap. Its marble patterns and luxurious golden ring accentuate its position as a luxurious and contemporary creation. Matching the bottle, the case reflects the creamy marble patterns with a metallic focal lens at its center."
Available in 40 and 90 ml Eau de Parfum.

"This is a sunbeam, a radiant joy that enchants every instant. A Coco-Rose warmth undulates between Sandalwood and White Musk. A vibrant ecstasy.
And suddenly, the horizon, bordered by Ozonic shades, lights up in a manifestation of joy... A silent glow of Pink Pepper warms our being, adding its imprint of Coco-Rose-colored happiness to the grand book of memories. Then, in a white embrace, all in Lily of the Valley and Frangipani, we find ourselves comforted under the most favorable auspices. Sovereign radiance, endless wonder, a sunbeam soft as a kiss of Sandalwood and White Musk. Ardent emotion of a Vanilla-ethereal warmth that caresses. Hearts open, souls blossom, intoxicated with light, in a moment of gentle fervor."

Walk with Me through both sunny and rainy days. Uncover hidden gems as we journey, discovering unexpected wonders. The drive of fantasy and projection; scent holds the power of seduction.

perfumes_data.name: The Heart of Leo Gucci for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: The Heart of Leo by Gucci is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. The Heart of Leo was launched in 2024. Top note is Black Currant; middle note is Olibanum; base note is Myrrh.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Gucci’s The Alchemist’s Garden is a Luxury Collection of sophisticated Eau de Parfums, Perfumed Oils, and Acque Profumate inspired by the art of alchemy. Captivated by the star-studded sky, the Gucci alchemist dreams of a new olfactory Gucci fragrance honouring the brightest star from the Lion constellation - Gucci The Heart of Leo. Guided by his brightness, the lion leaps from the sky in search of the world’s most precious ingredients. Knowing that resinous incense brings opulence to those who possess it, the lion jumps to the Arabic peninsula where Olibanum grows. Here, the noble creature encounters the tears of weeping trees, the bark exuding an unexpected, spicy scent that warms his heart. A symphony of balsamic resin traverses continents through golden winds, beckoning the lion to return to his homeland, Africa. As he follows the scent to yet another tree, he encounters the balsamic nectar of myrrh and its liquorice smoky undertones that liberate his soul. To sweeten his journey back to the moon, the lion garlands his mane in a blood-red blackcurrant accord. With the promise of dawn nearing, harmony returns as the lion resumes his position in the sky. Happy with the lion’s fabled journey, the Gucci alchemist carefully encases the fruity, ambery elixir– and its night-sky-inspired story – in a black lacquered bottle. Much like the alchemist's ability to transform all that he touches into newfound wonders, this unisex Gucci fragrance is manufactured using alcohol made from 100% recycled carbon emissions.
Capturing the spirit of nature and distilling it into exquisite elixirs, The Alchemist’s Garden collection is composed of customisable Gucci fragrances intended to be layered together.
Each olfactory creation draws on a hero ingredient that changes and magnifies its character when worn with other Gucci scents.
The beauty of alchemy lies in the transformation: layered aromas that become new expressions of art and unfold the magic of unseen worlds.
The Gucci Heart of Leo unisex Gucci Eau de Parfum offers six recommended layering combinations, each designed to bring out the richness and opulence of its warm facets captured by its golden mane.
Create a warm incense with Gucci The Eyes of The Tiger.
When applied with Gucci The Heart of Leo, the blend of Incense, Myrrh & Oriental captivates with its golden intensity.
Envision a floral tapestry woven with the opulent Damask Rose essence of Gucci A Reason to Love.
Incense, Myrrh & Rose-infused Oud Accord summon sultry depths, revealing a gourmand and floral bouquet of aromas.|Add a touch of sweetness to the Myrrh with Gucci A Chant for the Nymph.
Infuse floral undertones into Incense & Myrrh with the Frangipani accord to create a sweet incense.
Enhance the Gucci fragrance’s rich character with Gucci A Forgotten Rose Perfumed Oil.
A fresh Rose combined with Incense & Myrrh enriches the composition with its symphony of warm and fresh aromas.
Envelop yourself in the magic of the night with Gucci Moonlight Serenade Acqua Profumata.
A Musky Lavender invigorates the ambery blend of Incense & Myrrh, infusing a sense of freshness into the composition.
Unveil the richness of the ambery facets with Gucci A Forgotten Rose Perfumed Oil and Gucci Moonlight Serenade Acqua Profumata.
Rose & Lavender introduce floral hints to the Incense & Myrrh in this ambery aromatic olfactory creation.

perfumes_data.name: Mauve Max Philip for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Mauve by Max Philip is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Mauve was launched in 2024. Top notes are Hazelnut and Vanilla; middle notes are Pear, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Sandalwood, Ambergris and Olibanum.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Max Philip Mauve unfolds as an elegant and profound fragrance, designed to inspire and captivate. It begins with a sophisticated blend of hazelnut and creamy vanilla, setting a luxurious foundation. The heart is a delicate bouquet of pear, jasmine, and rose, exuding a romantic and refined aroma. As it evolves, the deep notes of olibanum, ambergris, and sandalwood emerge, offering a rich and lasting depth. Max Philip Mauve is a uniquely creative and powerful scent, perfect for those who embrace their elegance and inspire with their presence.

perfumes_data.name: Girl of the Year Thin Wild Mercury for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Girl of the Year by Thin Wild Mercury is a Leather fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Girl of the Year was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Cathleen Cardinali. Top notes are Lipstick and Incense; middle notes are Leather and Smoke; base notes are Orris Root, Fur and Sandalwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
A dark and feminine combination of burning incense and buttery lipstick permeating through a smoker’s leather jacket drying down to a creamy, warm sandalwood and musky, powdery orris root.
Girl of the Year is an exploration into the private enclaves of the woman, off film, away from parties, protected from the flash of the camera. It is the quiet moments between calls and engagements, the space reserved for nestling into your memories. Artifacts of a life being lived populate your space, untidy and endearing: the leather jacket left behind by a lover lazily draped on the sofa, your vanity clumsy with perfumes and jewelry, the littered ashtray on your windowsill. Every article of clothing and tube of lipstick a talisman of self expression and protection becomes a souvenir of the moment, iconic of an era. From the solitude of your dressing table, you stare at your reflection with no one else to see. The phone rings.

This scent combines notes of whipped cream and coffee with a heart of biscuit accord, vanilla, and coconut milk, resting on a base of sandalwood, chocolate, and powdery musk.

perfumes_data.name: Melipona Nectar Olfactif for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Melipona by Nectar Olfactif is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Melipona was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Serge de Oliveira. Top note is Bourbon Vanilla; middle notes are Cashmere Wood and Amber; base notes are Vanilla Sugar, Musk and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Vanilla comes from Mexico where the Aztecs used it to soften the bitterness of chocolate. There were numerous European attempts to cultivate pods outside their original cradle. Louis XIV fell in love with it and wanted to cultivate it on Bourbon Island, in Reunion. But all attempts under his reign failed. No one knew how to fertilize vanilla outside its native area. Europeans were unaware that the Mexican Melipona bee was responsible for pollination. Indeed, thanks to it, the orchid provides a long green fruit commonly called vanilla pod.
Gourmet and suave, Melipona is a fragrance that opens elegantly with woody and vanilla notes and gives way to oriental and amber notes in the base.

perfumes_data.name: Musky Rain Renier Perfumes for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Musky Rain by Renier Perfumes is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Musky Rain was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Renier R. Mendez. Top notes are Litchi, Black Pepper, Rose and Bergamot; middle notes are Narcissus, Ylang Ylang, Australian Sandalwood and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Civet, Amber, Benzoin and Vanilla.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Musky Rain is a musky, soft, and narcotic floral fragrance, inspired by the image of the painting of the same name. It is described as a unique composition that has been inspired by a secret love story, as well as the musks and ambers used.
A top note of bergamot and lychee wrapped in a spicy rose are the first chords of the composition, resting on a floral body. Narcissus absolute is the protagonist of the journey, while chords of jasmine and ylang-ylang help sweeten this dark flower, just as Indian Mysore sandalwood brings creaminess and sensuality to the fragrance.In the base notes, musks and ambers create the attractive character of the perfume.
TOP NOTES: Bergamote, Lychee, Black Pepper, Rose
MIDDLE NOTES: Narcissus absolute, Jasmine, Ylang Ylang, Sandalwood
BASE NOTES: Musk, Vanilla, Oriental, Civet, Benzoin
Available as a 50 ml Extrait de Parfum.

Sweet amaretto and fiery nutmeg fuse with a heart of buttery suede and rich orris, joined at the base with golden patchouli and the smoky depth of labdanum resin.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Ex Nihilo's Speed Legends Night Drive perfume is inspired by the thrill of high-speed racing, reflecting the adrenaline-fuelled rush in olfactory form through invigorating bergamot, vetiver, and tonka bean. This rendition, produced in collaboration with photographer RIOCAM, puts a twist on the scent with sensual notes of wood and amber, embodying the thrilling cinematic views of a midnight race.

perfumes_data.name: Sublime Tory Burch for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Sublime by Tory Burch is a Leather fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Sublime was launched in 2024. Sublime was created by Rodrigo Flores-Roux and Christine Hassan. Top notes are Italian Mandarin, Ivy and Peach; middle notes are Magnolia, Osmanthus and Rose; base notes are Leather, Vetiver and Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Sublime by Tory Burch is an intriguing scent that blends leather with delicate rose and Osmanthus flower, earthy vetiver, and bright mandarin. This fragrance offers a unique and sensual dimension, embodying confidence and strength. Created in collaboration with Master Perfumer Rodrigo Flores-Roux and Perfumer Christine Hassan, Sublime uses the highest-quality ingredients.
The campaign is starring Kendall Jenner.
Tory Burch Sublime is available in 30, 50, and 90 ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Cappadocia Memo Paris for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Cappadocia by Memo Paris is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cappadocia was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Gaël Montero.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Here, in Cappadocia, at the heart of Türkiye, the earth retains the memory of an unblemished emotion, a shiver of saffron, sandalwood and myrrh surfaces on the skin. Impressive, ancestral formations rise up like exclamations to the sky. They are known as ‘fairy chimneys’, natural pillars of soft, friable rock shaped by volcanic eruption, the passage of time and the weathering of the elements. They watch over the mountains, craters, plateaus and gorges, over the underground and cave-dwelling cities.
The palette of Cappadocia is organic, carnal: white jasmine, ochre benzoin, Turkish rose, gold vanilla and tawny sandalwood. Come nightfall, a purple iris arrives and then the chimney tops secretly open, releasing the caressing perfume of flowers, resins and woods: a message to the stars. A multi-coloured hot-air balloon appears on the horizon; the passengers in its basket sail above the landscape’s varied facets, swept away by its airy, scent-filled beauty. The fragrance Cappadocia makes this a dream come true.

perfumes_data.name: Hinoki & Cedarwood Jo Malone London for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Hinoki & Cedarwood by Jo Malone London is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Hinoki & Cedarwood was launched in 2024. Hinoki & Cedarwood was created by Celine Roux and Anne Flipo.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Deep in the Japanese wilderness, the grounding presence of the hinoki tree is experienced through the ritual of forest bathing.

perfumes_data.name: Lavande 31 Le Labo for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Lavande 31 by Le Labo is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lavande 31 was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Daphné Bugey. Top notes are Neroli and Bergamot; middle note is Lavender; base notes are Musk, Tonka and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Le Labo invites us on a bold journey with LAVANDE 31—a captivating twist on lavender that reshapes our perceptions and redefines the tradition of this scent.
LAVANDE 31 revitalizes lavender, shedding its nostalgic connotations and elevating it to new heights. Infused with bergamot and neroli essential oils, it unveils an unexpected freshness, accentuating the purity of lavender flower buds through vertical distillation. The perfume's base, a Le Labo signature, mixes amber, musk, and tonka, creating a uniquely classic yet rebellious scent.
According to the brand, LAVANDE 31 exemplifies perfume as art, reinventing familiar notes into olfactory masterpieces that ignite the senses and inspire the mind.
Releasing on 1st October 2023, Lavande 31 is available as a 100ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Raku Les Bains Guerbois for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Japanese faience, crackled, milky, creamy, sensual, thick, radical.
Les Bains Paris loves the raku of its bar, consoles and tables that adorn his rooms and that the hand touches. A trail of perfume. Spaces. A mythical place.
Lemon, fig, cedar. Synesthesia.

perfumes_data.name: Sogno Notturno Brunello Cucinelli for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Sogno Notturno is an enveloping fragrance crafted by Quentin Bisch, characterized by a woody depth. It features a suave and addictive base with vibrant and structured woods. The fragrance is highlighted by the elegant, creamy, and musky sensuality of sandalwood, invigorated by the precious note of cumin. The floral delicacy of osmanthus adds a vintage modernity, while the distinctive balsamic scent of vetiver enriches the composition.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: 47 Ag Silver by Rituals is a new and limited edition fragrance released in 2024. This spicy-oriental scent is designed for both women and men, offering a unique blend of rum and spices in the top notes, jasmine in the heart, and a base of myrrh and tonka bean.

perfumes_data.short_description: Tiramisu Coco by Zimaya is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Tiramisu Coco was launched in 2024. Top notes are Amaretto and Coffee; middle notes are Ice cream, Biscuit and Vanilla; base notes are Vanilla, Brown sugar and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Tiramisu Coco by Zimaya is a unisex fragrance that captures the essence of the beloved Italian dessert. This Eau de Parfum features a rich blend of coffee and amaretto in the top notes, followed by a heart of vanilla, biscuit, and ice cream. The base notes of amber, vanilla, and brown sugar add warmth and sweetness to the composition.

perfumes_data.name: Bronze Goddess Flora Verde Estée Lauder for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Bronze Goddess Flora Verde by Estée Lauder is a Floral Green fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Bronze Goddess Flora Verde was launched in 2024. Top notes are Coconut Water, Bigarade and Bergamot; middle notes are Gardenia, Ylang Ylang and Pink Pepper; base notes are Jasmine Sambac, Musk and Sandalwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
This scent is a symphony of exotic and vibrant notes, harmoniously blending the zesty freshness of Italian bergamot and the creamy sweetness of coconut water with the tangy twist of orange bigarade. The heart of the fragrance unfolds with the peppery sparkle of pink pepper, intertwined with the rich, tropical aroma of Brazilian gardenia and the luxurious depth of ylang essential oil. The base notes provide a sensual foundation with the opulent essence of jasmine sambac absolute, the earthy warmth of sandalwood, and the subtle allure of skin musk. This fragrance embodies the essence of Carnival - a wild and enticing celebration of life, encapsulating the rhythm of a tropical night filled with dance, allure, and vivacious energy. It's an olfactory journey that is both seductive and lively, evoking the spirit of endless festivity under the stars.
A limited edition available as a 50ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Radical Rose Extrait Matiere Premiere for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Radical Rose Extrait by Matiere Premiere is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Radical Rose Extrait was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Aurélien Guichard.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Radical Rose Extrait is transformed by Immortelle Absolute from Croatia, a guest ingredient known for its pronounced character that blends salt and flower. This addition deepens the rose note, adding a darker, more mineral aspect to the fragrance, making it robust and unique.

perfumes_data.name: Epona Papillon Artisan Perfumes for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Epona by Papillon Artisan Perfumes is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Epona was launched in 2024.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The strength and majesty of leather, the sweet dance of hay on the summer’s eve; and overarching these, the compelling velvet heat of horse hide. Epona, a tribute to the Celtic goddess of horses, captures the essence of equine potency and pastoral tranquillity. The delicate floral touches of violet dance in ebbing sunbeams, while distinct saddle soap accord brings a vibrancy that springs forth from balmy hair. Gods and Goddesses streak luminous resin fingerprints on sun-drenched saddles; thundering hooves softened with honey. Verdant grass tumbles and sears in August’s gilded sun. Colt strands stream in summer’s soft tempest. And you breathe again, with leather, heat, meadows and skin.
Our Perfumer's Inspiration
"Epona embodies the cherished memories of Liz’s bond with her beloved horse amidst the enchanting English countryside. Inspired by their intimate connection, it captures the essence of warm summer days spent amidst sweet hay fields and the gentle caress of the sun. The fragrance intertwines notes of leather, opoponax, and violet to evoke the comforting scent of a cherished saddle and the earthy aroma of a horse's coat. With a subtle hint of saddle soap accord, it reminisces the tender care lavished upon a faithful companion. Epona is a nostalgic ode to the timeless bond between horse and rider amidst nature's embrace. Liz has placed her own leather accord and distinctive horse accord against honey, vetiver, oakmoass and petitgrain for a complex and stirring capturing of horse skin, hair, leather and meadows."

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Une Nuit Parisienne unveils the spirit of Parisian nightlife.Hazelnut and chai spices are contrasted with rich, velvety rose and enveloping black tea on a luxurious base of honeyed amber, benzoin and sandalwood. The perfumer is Michael Nordstrand.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: "Laundry Day was dreamed up on a dark Parisian day, when Abel's founder tasked their master perfumer with bottling the optimism and energy of spring. The brief was to capture that first day of the season when you throw open your windows, inhale the aroma of freshly cut grass, and take joy in the ritual of hanging your sheets on the line, knowing they’ll dry crisp and fresh. Laundry Day is a metaphor for all that is possible in the change of seasons." -Abel Web Journal.

perfumes_data.name: Butterlily Damselfly 4160 Tuesdays for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Intrigued by the aroma of waterlilies we swam to the centre of a lake to smell them, buzzed by iridescent damselflies. To complete the scene, oak trees, cut grass, fresh water, hay bales, beeswax and warm skin.

perfumes_data.name: Honey Jasmine Karma 4160 Tuesdays for women and men

perfumes_data.short_description: Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie 20th Anniversary by Roja Dove is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie 20th Anniversary was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Aldehydes, Bergamot, Lemon and Lime; middle notes are Jasmine, Geranium, Ylang Ylang, Magnolia, Freesia, Rose, Peach, Violet and Clary Sage; base notes are Musk, Amber, Sandalwood, Rhubarb, Clove, Transparent Woods, Frankincense, Patchouli, Cedar, Labdanum, Benzoin, Vanilla, Moss, Orris, Peru Balsam, Tonka Bean and Agarwood (Oud).
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Celebrate 20 years of the Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie with this special edition design, limited to only 150 bottles. Each will be signed and numbered by Roja Dove and includes a certificate of authentication.
An exciting new exclusive to the Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie, RDHP20 is a celebration in scented form. Created especially for our 20th Anniversary, this special new piece commemorates two decades of our mission to bring the cutting-edge of luxury perfumery to fragrance-lovers across the world.
As we enjoy this exciting milestone, we invite you to celebrate with us by enjoying an exuberant new composition. Like a dazzling visit to the Haute Parfumerie, a collection of 31 luxurious raw materials set the scene for scene for an Ambrée accord as opulent and enduring as the boutique itself.
Luminous Citrus notes and Aldehydes which sparkle like our iconic chandeliers make a luminous first impression. A decadent blend of expensive Woods blend with pillowy base of Oriental and Vanilla to sink the senses into the plush surroundings of the shop. A finishing touch of Clear Woods - a unique material crafted from Patchouli Isolate - sign the hallmark of another pioneering new creation from Perfumer, Roja Dove.
An homage to an amazing 20 years with a bold vision of the future, RDHP20 is ready to enter the roaring 20's era for The Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie.

perfumes_data.name: Nina Precious Gold Nina Ricci for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Nina Precious Gold by Nina Ricci is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Nina Precious Gold was launched in 2024. Nina Precious Gold was created by Olivier Cresp and Nicolas Bonneville. Top notes are Tangerine, Bergamot and Sicilian Lemon; middle notes are Orange Blossom, Pistachio and Almond; base notes are Vanilla, Ambroxan, Cedar and Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Nina Precious Gold embodies feminine elegance, a musky floral perfume with amber undertones, crafted by renowned perfumers Olivier Cresp and Nicolas Bonneville. The sparkling top notes of tangerine, bergamot, and recycled Italian lemon harmoniously intertwine with a heart of pistachio, voluptuous Moroccan orange blossom, almond, and an enveloping blend of musks. The seductive base of the perfume reveals a woody foundation of ambrox and cedar, wrapped in warm vanilla, adding an irresistible finishing touch.

perfumes_data.name: Valentine Aromas de Salazar for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Valentine by Aromas de Salazar is a Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Valentine was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Michael Salazar. Top notes are Violet, Cardamom, Raspberry, Indonesian Patchouli Leaf, Orange Blossom and Bitter Orange; middle notes are Iris, Heliotrope, Gardenia, Bulgarian Rose, Acácia and Jasmine; base notes are White Chocolate, Cognac, Vanilla, Benzoin, Resin and Cypress Leaf.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Experience the enchanting allure of Valentine, where vibrant violet meets earthy patchouli. The fragrance opens with a sparkling blend of Violet, Orange Blossom Absolute, and Indonesian Patchouli, accented by Raspberry and Cardamom Absolute adds a hint of spice.
The heart reveals luxurious Orris, Bulgarian Rose, and Jasmine Grandiflorum, enriched by Gardenia Extract and the sweet notes of Heliotrope and Sweet Cassie.
In the base, rich Cognac, Cypress Leaf, and White Chocolate blend with Vanilla Absolute, and Aged Laotian Benzoin. Valentine is a sophisticated embrace of floral elegance and depth.
Notes:
Top: Violet, Orange Blossom Abs, Indonesian Patchouli, Raspberry, Bitter Orange, Cardamom Abs
Heart: Iris, Bulgarian Rose Abs, Jasmine Grandiflorum Abs, Gardenia Extract, Heliotrope, Sweet Cassie Abs
Base: Cognac, Cypress Leaf, White Chocolate, Vanilla Abs, Aged Laotian Benzoin Resin

perfumes_data.name: Bonbon Pop The House of Oud for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Bonbon Pop by The House of Oud is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Bonbon Pop was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Douglas Morel. Top notes are White Peach, Coconut and Bergamot; middle notes are Patchouli and Jasmine; base notes are Brown sugar, Precious Woods, Musk and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Greedy. Amusing. Captivating. In a word: Pop! This fragrance transports us back to the past, bringing back that innocent carefreeness and infinite serenity of when we were children and we loved to gorge ourselves on sweet treats. The juicy notes of White Peach and exotic Coconut evoke the softness of candy. Woods and Oriental infuse warmth. Whole Sugar radiates its fragrant notes releasing an unparalleled sweetness. A triumph of delicious notes that gives us a little piece of nostalgic happiness. A veritable whirlwind of gluttony that envelops us in a sweet and intriguing embrace.

perfumes_data.name: Fleur d’Oh OHTOP for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Fleur d’Oh by OHTOP is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Fleur d’Oh was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Alexis Dadier.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Inspiration: bare essentials.
Any creator sooner or later finds himself confronted to the idea of simplicity. Feeling the lure to simplify again and again, until almost complete nakedness. In fact, we all seek an apparent carelessness concealing an actual sophistication.
This cologne is a perfume that becomes one with us in stark nakedness, exposing a studied casualness stating, “I am what I am”.

Olfactive Stylism: nudity through freshness.
Fleur d’Oh suggests naked simplicity through innocent freshness. This sharp creation highlights a signature shiso leaf paired with yuzu to boost a skin-soft orange blossom. A fragrance as necessary as water on bare skin.

Romeo's words: “Tender as maternal skin, smooth as a thin fabric.”
Perfumer: Alexis Dadier (Robertet)
Fleur d'OH is a gender fluid orange blossom that oscillates between the radiance and softness of orange blossom, and the vibration of modern amber woods. This is a theme that is dear to me because I have always wanted to wear an orange blossom perfume that is neither feminine nor classic cologne. The yuzu and shiso leaves start creates a spark whose light extends to the bottom of this fragrance lined with moss and musks.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"Nocturnal wandering through the joyous hustle and bustle of the city. Ethereal Lo-Fi kick in the headphones.  Veil of cashmere musk as a second skin.  An intoxicating murmur guides my steps across the evening rumor. A bewitching, dreamlike and exquisite caress."
Main notes : Hypnotic musks, enveloping cashmere, reverb iris, radiant bergamot, analogic aldehydes, silky ambrette, translucent pear, jasmine delay, soothing cedarwood, infrabass ambroxan.
Available in 15 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Mandorle by Soradora is a captivating fragrance that tells a story of seduction. The fragrance combines intoxicating gourmand notes with a musky roundness, creating a sensual and long-lasting scent with smoky leather undertones.

perfumes_data.name: Sissa Mind Games for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Sissa by Mind Games is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Sissa was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christelle Laprade. Top notes are Sesame, Coumarin and Ambrette (Musk Mallow); middle notes are Milk, Tonka Bean and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Musk and Labdanum.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
A profound perfume scent, Sissa embodies the power of exponential growth, opening with full-bodied notes of toasted sesame to awaken the senses before unfolding in a sultry, resonant flourish. Mirroring the promise of boundless potential, Sissa captivates gradually with each fleeting moment, revealing perfume notes of luscious gourmands and delicate florals, mesmerized by the warm, earthy foundation of labdanum and musks. Sissa exhilarates the mind with thought-provoking reminder that it is the small steps that pave the way to greatness.
"I was inspired to play with edible notes in a new way, less traditional sweet facets but more savory, warmed elements. Ambrette Seed leads the fragrance in warmth allowing the toasted sesame seed and coumarin heart to open and grow against the contrast of the enveloping, resinous facets of the labdanum in the finish. This fragrance feels personal and has a cocooning trail." - Christelle Laprade, Perfumer.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Kashmir by Ormonde Jayne is a woody hypnotic scent that emphasizes Deodar from the cedarwood family and a soft dreamy sandalwood. It is underscored with iris, rose, jasmine, cashmeran, vanilla, and a caress of musk to fix this pervasive perfume.

perfumes_data.name: Crème Brûlée Jousset Parfums for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Crème Brûlée by Jousset Parfums is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Crème Brûlée was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jimmy Bodin. Top notes are Fresh Cream and Spun Sugar; middle notes are Burnt Sugar, Custard and Vanilla; base notes are Bourbon Vanilla and Whipped Cream.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
You've been eagerly anticipating this for months, if not an entire year!

This collection was crafted exclusively for the most gourmand among you, and we have put in tremendous effort to achieve a masterpiece of excellence.

In the meantime, we wanted to reveal the secret of Jimmy Bodin's new working method by giving you a taste of ultra-gourmand perfumery with ultra-realistic scents. Le Gourmand and Ciao Bello Pistachio are the embodiment of your desires and emotions. 

Today, after an incredible and joy-filled journey, Les Délices de Jousset are finally available. Whether you have a tiny sweet tooth or a huge desire to indulge, we've crafted them in unique formats for Jousset Parfums.

Les Délices de Jousset are available in 30ml and 100ml of pure gourmandise.
Indulge in the luxurious world of Crème Brûlée, a fragrance that perfectly captures the essence of the classic French dessert with notes of caramelized sugar, rich vanilla custard, and a touch of burnt sugar crust.
This perfume is perfect for those who love sophisticated and sweet gourmand scents. Let yourself be captivated by the decadent aroma of Crème Brûlée.
Perfumer's Note: Gourmand, Sweet, Creamy, Caramelized, Rich, Luxurious
Top Notes: Caramelized Sugar, Fresh Cream
Heart Notes: Vanilla Custard, Burnt Sugar Crust
Base Notes: Whipped Cream, Bourbon Vanilla

perfumes_data.name: Strawberry Mochi d'Annam for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Strawberry Mochi by d'Annam is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. Strawberry Mochi was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Anh Ngo.

perfumes_data.name: La Foncedalle Versatile Paris for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: La Foncedalle by Versatile Paris is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. La Foncedalle was launched in 2024. La Foncedalle was created by Amelie Bourgeois and Margaux Le Paih Guérin.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Why a perfume inspired by CBD and food?
If there are two things we like here at Versatile … It’s eating and partying! La Foncedalle is the perfect mix of those two. Inspired by the big party with our pals and that delicious crispy chicken, this fragrance is as bold as appetizing. We tried our best to replicate (like we always do), an unforgettable olfactive experience: a smell that reminiscent us of our best parties and made us hungry as well.
What does LA FONCEDALLE smell like?
It’s an atypical fragrance that is as intoxicating as mouth-watering! La Foncedalle is a combination of weed notes and aromas accompanied by a perfectly fresh beer and a delicious chicken straight from the rotisserie. Inspired by our drunk parties where we eat (more than we should) La Foncedalle offers us a similar experience … without the bad trip!
NOTES: Weed. Aromatic. Beer. Fresh. Sage. Chicken. Crispy. Butter. Musky

This Eau de Parfum features a powerful array of flowers, where a heady bouquet of delicate red roses intersects with the sensuality of rose essence, lush neroli, and sweet jasmine. TOP NOTES

MIDDLE NOTES
Damask Rose absolute, Neroli and Jasmine absolute
BASE NOTES
Oakmoss, Patchouli, Ambroxan and Love Accord

perfumes_data.short_description: Bull's Blood 2nd Edition by Imaginary Authors is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Bull's Blood 2nd Edition was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Josh Meyer.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"The women and men in these pages are lovers and brawlers, bullfighters and boxers, soft talkers and hard drinkers. They inhabit dusty Spanish villages and dank, dark brothels. At the heart of these unforgettable characters is a determined and undying passion that pushes them to make extraordinary decisions in the face of fear. Their fates are varied but the outcome is always the same, these are stories that grip you by the throat and don’t let go until you profess your devotion. Seductive and steadfast, this classic is not for the faint of heart but for the full of heart."
NOTES: Geranium, Spanish Rose, Patchouli, Black Musk, Tobacco, Sandalwood, Bull’s Blood.
"No other fragrance in our line balances brutality and elegance like this beast. Ignore the glares, take the bull by horns, and show the world who’s boss. "
Available in 50ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Dilshad 17.1 Pierre Guillaume Paris for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Dilshad 17.1 by Pierre Guillaume Paris is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Dilshad 17.1 was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Guillaume.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Dilshad 17.1 by Pierre Guillaume Paris is a fragrance that features a unique pistachio and tuberose accord. The complexity of tuberose is complemented by the bitterness and green notes of pistachio, creating a harmonious blend. Almond milk and musk add a delicate touch to the composition.
DILSHAD means “The one who brings happiness” in Persian, a reference to the Iranian pistachio.

perfumes_data.name: Memori Encens Lumière Kenzo for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Memori Encens Lumière by Kenzo is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Memori Encens Lumière was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Karine Dubreuil-Sereni.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Interpretation of a hut with mystical scents; that of the worn leather and the silk of kimonos, majestic dresses impregnated with incense sachets that geishas slip into the hollow of their sleeves to perfume themselves. The Eau de Parfum Encens Lumière, for women and men, accurately combines the smoky notes of Incense with the floral sweetness of Freesia and Saffron flowers.
Perfumer Karine Dubreuil-Sereni explains

"I endeavored to capture the olfactory sensations - as I imagined them - that one may experience in a mysterious Japanese teahouse. Incense is the very pillar of my creation. A noble material, it brings unique light as well as depth and elegance to this perfume. Its contrasting scents first exude sparkling top notes, before giving way to a warm and enveloping trail."

– God forbid –
An old saying that works as a an energy shield against what might go wrong in the daily life.
Let’s not get superstitious here but, just in case,… Doamne FERESTE might do the trick.
When you hit rock bottom and things don’t go your way, God seems to be the last retreat.
Spray and pray, God  Almighty love’s us all.

perfumes_data.name: Oud Nebula The Harmonist for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Oud Nebula Parfum by The Harmonist is a sophisticated and modern fragrance that reveals the rich complexity of Amber and Oud. Crafted by perfumer Guillaume Flavigny, this scent envelops you in a powerful woody and spicy aroma, reflecting the unique qualities of Oud, often referred to as 'Black Gold'. The fragrance features an Amber heart, accentuated by Oud, warmed by Cedar and Sandalwood, spiced with Saffron and Tonka Bean, and delicately enhanced by Bulgarian Rose.

perfumes_data.name: Fig Me Up Mancera for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Fig Me Up by Mancera is a Aromatic Green fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Fig Me Up was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top notes are Rhubarb, French Violet and Fig Leaf; middle notes are Fig Nectar, Plum, Oud, Bourbon Geranium and Australian Sandalwood; base notes are Tobacco, White Musk, Toffee and Tonka Bean.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
FIG ME UP by Mancera is more than a fragrance—it’s an irresistible, sensory journey.
The bold, violet-grey hue of the juice hints at the depth within. Upon first spray, the luscious sweetness of fig and the soft, powdery elegance of violet immediately envelop you, evoking a sense of warmth and contentment. As the fragrance unfolds, a lively burst of green rhubarb injects brightness, while tonka bean adds a peppery nuance that invigorates the senses. This blend of contrasts makes Fig Me Up stand out as an unforgettable, distinctive scent.
Created for those with bold, confident tastes, Fig Me Up goes beyond being just a fleeting scent. It’s a signature that leaves a lasting mark. At its heart, an almost hidden yet deeply sensual accord emerges, where the sweetness of candied plum blends seamlessly with the opulence of oud and sandalwood. Earthy tobacco adds a soft, comforting layer, ensuring the fragrance lingers delicately, offering a quiet yet undeniable allure throughout the day.
Fig Me Up by Mancera evolves in three uplifting stages. It begins with a fresh, invigorating rush of Mediterranean fig leaves and zesty green rhubarb, evoking the vibrancy of a sunlit morning. The heart reveals a refined whisper of French violet, adding a soothing, floral grace. As the scent deepens, creamy fig milk envelops the senses in warmth, complemented by the richness of Australian oud and sandalwood. The base is enriched by sweet Venezuelan tonka and the comforting softness of Cuban tobacco, leaving a lingering trail of gentle, lasting pleasure.
Fig Me Up by Mancera is a fragrance crafted to evoke pure joy, unfolding in three uplifting phases. It opens with a vibrant burst of Mediterranean fig leaves and zesty green rhubarb, bringing an immediate sense of freshness and vitality, like a bright morning in a sun-drenched orchard. As the scent evolves, the heart introduces the soft elegance of French violet, a floral whisper that adds a calming, delicate touch. As the fragrance deepens, creamy fig milk wraps the senses in a warm cocoon, beautifully complemented by the richness of Australian oud and sandalwood. The base lingers with the sweet and soothing notes of Venezuelan tonka and Cuban tobacco, leaving behind a comforting trail that feels like an endless smile.
Top notes: Mediterranean fig leaves, green rhubarb, French violet
Middle notes: creamy fig milk, Australian oud and sandalwood, candied plum, geranium Bourbon
Base notes: hot toffee, Venezuelan tonka beans, Cuban tobacco, white musk
Fig Me Up is availablle as 60ml and 120ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Inspired by the ancient tales of Chinese imperial dragons and their mythical strengths, this new limited edition is designed around the notion that we all carry an invisible power.
A blend of olibanum and tonka bean spices, grounded with cedar wood, opens up to a warm, spicy heart. Jasmine adds luminosity while the dry down reveals a rich, intense signature, making it bold, mesmerizing and deeply comforting.

perfumes_data.name: Le Parfum Bridal Elie Saab for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Le Parfum Bridal by Elie Saab is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Le Parfum Bridal was launched in 2023. Top notes are Orange Blossom, Mandarin Orange and Neroli; middle notes are Ylang-Ylang, Gardenia and Vanilla; base notes are Amber, Musk and Benzoin.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Elie Saab Le Parfum Bridal launches in the fall of 2023 as a fragrance that draws its inspiration from the opulent bridal collection of designer ELIE SAAB. Just as the designer's exquisite gowns leave an indelible impression, this perfume aims to envelop you in a captivating veil of scent.
Like the delicate drape of a veil, this fragrance reveals an Eau de Parfum that is soft, self-assured, and utterly captivating. Elie Saab's Le Parfum Bridal celebrates the uniqueness of every woman, evoking a sense of cherished admiration.
Reflecting the essence of a bridal bouquet, it weaves together floral and creamy elements to create a truly enchanting olfactory experience. The romantic allure of gardenia finds expression in harmony with an irresistible blend of radiant amber, velvety white vanilla, and sunlit ylang-ylang. The luminous facets of mandarin and orange blossom lend an illuminating touch.
Top notes are mandarin, orange blossom, and neroli. Heart notes include vanilla, ylang-ylang, and gardenia. Base notes are musk, benzoin, and amber.
The bottle's facets, reminiscent of a diamond's precision cut, marry clean lines with an elegant, feminine aesthetic, adorned by a delicate lace pattern.
Elie Saab Le Parfum Bridal is available as a 30ml, 50ml, and 90ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: "My travels led me to Puerto Rico, the island of enchantment. I visited three times that year, captivated by the rich culture, pride, and hidden gems like Icacos, Culebra, and Vieques. It felt like home, I could feel the deep history embedded in the atmosphere and music. To my Puerto Rican friends, I hope this Fragrance has done justice to your beautiful island."

perfumes_data.name: Bella Donna Bugatti Fashion for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Bella Donna by Bugatti Fashion is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Bella Donna was launched in 2023. Top notes are Pear, Peach and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Gardenia, Rose and Jasmine; base notes are Powdery Notes, Musk and Cedar.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Bugatti Bella Donna embodies the quintessential Italian concept of la dolce vita, exuding an infectious enthusiasm for life. This scent captures the essence of a sun-soaked day and evokes a fruity-floral ambiance. Its lightness gracefully accompanies a woman throughout her day, accentuating her spontaneity while highlighting her sensuality and femininity with a touch of classic elegance.
Luscious peach conjures up the warmth of summer, blending seamlessly with juicy pear and a hint of spicy pink pepper to create a welcoming opening accord. At the heart of the fragrance lies a jasmine bouquet, which stimulates the imagination and tenderly caresses the senses.
A captivatingly graceful rose lends harmony to the heart, perfectly balanced by the bewitching intensity of gardenia. The delicate pink hues of the Bella Donna fragrance are echoed in its exquisite finale, where the powdery musk base is elegantly contrasted. The composition is artfully completed by the woody undertones of cedar.

through fingers. To fall for.
A tender vanilla fairy tale, pear blossom blush, and musky clouds: for the one you want to be, for you now.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Eternal Wood evokes the awakening of a unique inspiration where Palo Santo and White Copal impregnate the air with mystical magic. At the heart of this experience, the humid warmth of the skin blends with this exotic fragrance. Burnt Oud and Davana accentuate the sensuality of the sillage, while Red Saffron imparts a passionate touch. Woody notes evoke the dense jungle, and the sweet scents of Toffee and Tonka remind one of tropical delights. This sensory adventure, extracted from Amelie’s memories, crystallizes a moment where nature, warmth, and magic unite in an enchanting perfume. 🤎
As we journey from San Cristobal to the Chihuahuan deserts, the ethereal essence of Palo Alto gracefully envelops us, transcending the mundane. Eternal Wood materializes in our reverie, guided by Mayan incense and burnt Oud.

It opens with a baked peach accord and Turkish rose absolute, evolving into a heart of Sri Lankan cinnamon, condensed milk, and puff pastry. The base features oak leaves and sugared musk, creating a luscious scent that blends sweetness with a hint of nostalgia.
Crafted by master perfumers Bertrand Duchaufour and Vincent Ricord with creative direction from Sharida.

perfumes_data.name: Empiryan Xerjoff for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Empiryan by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Empiryan was launched in 2023. Top notes are Tobacco Leaf and Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha; middle notes are Incense, Singapore Patchouli and Atlas Cedar; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Amber and Labdanum.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The Xerjoff K Blue perfume collection is based on the influential philosophical tradition of the alchemy associated with the holistic, ecological, and ethical methods of biodynamic philosophy.
Biodynamic agriculture and biodynamic gardening is how to integrate science with the spirit of nature.
Each perfume from the Kemi Blue collection is unique in the way it contains one or more ingredients obtained from biodynamic agriculture. Cosmic forces are important ingredients to complete the circle of the Xerjoff K Blue collection with a precise astrological perfume production calendar.
Inspired by ancient cosmologies and what is known as the “highest heaven”, Empiryan opens to earthy notes of cypriol and the warm yet sweet herbaceous notes of tobacco leaves. An experience that grounds the wearer with green, earthy notes gradually transports the senses to an ethereal state of calm and sacredness as incense and cedar are released at heart. Delicate yet compelling, Empiryan’s base of vanilla, labdanum, and amber perfectly rounds up this divine scent.
OLFACTORY NOTES

perfumes_data.name: Angélique Être for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Angélique by Être is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Angélique was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Lygia. Top notes are Carrot and Ginger; middle notes are Lilac and Iris; base notes are Musk and Indian Sandalwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
TO BE PEACEFUL
OUR INSPIRATION
Crafting Angélique was an adventure of making peace with failures. Our first idea was to use angelic seed essential oil, thinking it would perfectly embody the fragrance’s name. Yet, as art often dictates, it wasn’t quite right for the scent we dreamed of. That’s when we experimented with carrot seed essential oil—a less celebrated choice, the sidekick of many hero ingredients in perfumery, that doesn’t have the immediate charm of angelic seed essential oil but is rich with potential. It’s in this shift that Angélique truly began to blossom.
PEACE Angélique is like a peaceful melody in life's constant hustle.
This perfume is crafted for those on a journey to embracing life's imperfections, letting go of the past, finding peace with their flaws, and choosing to rise above and soar higher.

"When I first envisioned this vanilla fragrance, I aimed to capture true vanilla—subtle, sophisticated, and long-lasting with an intoxicating sillage, yet not overly sweet or fruity. It was essential that this fragrance resonate with an adult audience, reflecting refined elegance." – Lynn King, the founder

perfumes_data.detailed_description: On the opening, saffron lends an airy sweetness and a hint of spice while cassis and rose provide a lush freshness. Javanol, a molecular component reminiscent of a creamy sandalwood and rose, creates a powerful sillage. Natural sandalwood and a warm tobacco base ground the fragrance, adding depth and richness. Kashmir Fusion utilizes a complex molecular distillation process and rounds out the fragrance with a sensual, velvety silhouette. (info from the brand)

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Bois de Santal is an artful composition where sandalwood's rich and woody depth meets the subtle spice of cardamom and the warm sweetness of vanilla.This central note of sandalwood is a golden thread seamlessly interwoven with the sensual allure of cardamom, creating a lightly spiced composition that whispers luxury.The heart of the fragrance continues with supple cashmere woods lending a soft, velvety quality, while violet and orris emphasize the powdery edge of sandalwood. As the fragrance settles on the skin, notes of olibanum and vanilla envelop the wearer to produce a subtle warmth, a serene endnote to a fragrance that is both tranquil and tantalizing. Bois de Santal is an experience of understated luxury, an homage to the refined and the sophisticated. (info from the brand)

With its geometric shape in a light pink tone with small glitter particles as a highlight, the Kiss Me bottle immediately stands out from the crowd. The women's fragrance by the well-known YouTuber Naomi Jon, released in 2022, immediately puts you in a good mood with its floral and fresh accents - just the right choice for the next date!
The Eau de Parfum Spray Kiss Me impresses with its many fresh accents. Even the top note starts with orange and tangarine, citrusy and sparkling and makes you want to start the day as soon as you spray it on. With orange blossom, the orange can also be found in the heart note. Arabian jasmine provides a floral accent here. Orris root and musk dominate the sweetish, sensual base note. Make yourself happy with the lively feel-good fragrance or give the Eau de Parfum Spray to a friend of yours. This light everyday fragrance with its sweet and girly bottle is also very suitable for young fragrance fans.

Flamingo Fizz is a very versatile fragrance that has the joy of summer in it. However, you don't have to wait for a particular season to wear it because it's also a good choice in colder times due to its sweet notes.
Let this scent be with you in all parts of your life and make moments unforgettable!

perfumes_data.detailed_description: BOSS Alive Absolu is a sophisticated, leathery, and woody perfume that celebrates the power of the BOSS woman with richly layered ingredients. It makes a strong first impression with a warm leather note, followed by vibrant patchouli essence at the heart, and a captivating vanilla accord at the base, leaving a long-lasting trail.

perfumes_data.name: Absolue Rose Or Die Lancôme for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Absolue Rose Or Die by Lancôme is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Absolue Rose Or Die was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Frank Voelkl.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Dansant avec la fumée, la rose révèle ses secrets les plus sombres. Elle est audacieuse et subversive. Assombrie par les notes fumées du thé noir, la rose révèle ses facettes sombres aux côtés d'un bois de gaïac intense et masculin. Son côté sombre est inattendu et audacieux.

La vision du Maître-Parfumeur, Frank Voekl:
"Quand les volutes fumées et envoûtantes du thé noir rencontrent la fraîcheur délicate de la rose. Un parfum résolument contrasté, oscillant entre des nuances sombres et profondes et des tonalités plus lumineuses et colorées."
LE DOMAINE DE LA ROSE : LA CULTURE D'UNE ROSE INIMITABLE, SUR LA TERRE OÙ LA NATURE VIT À L'ÉTAT SAUVAGE
Découvrez Absolue Les Parfums, la première collection de haute-parfumerie dédiée à la rose cultivée au cœur de notre domaine : la Rose Centifolia. Composée de 11 jus d'exception, elle dévoile une rose exclusive comme vous ne l'avez jamais sentie auparavant.

LA RÉINVENTION DE L'INGRÉDIENT EMBLÉMATIQUE DE LA PARFUMERIE
Nos Maîtres-Parfumeurs se sont affranchis de la pyramide olfactive classique et ont inventé une nouvelle façon de construire un parfum avec la construction en halo. La rose devient le cœur d'une symphonie olfactive. Chaque parfum de la collection Absolue Les Parfums naît de la fusion de la rose exclusive Lancôme et d'un élément de la nature emblématique du domaine de la rose.

perfumes_data.name: Viridarium Maria Candida Gentile for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Viridarium by Maria Candida Gentile is a Aromatic Green fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Viridarium was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Maria Candida Gentile. Top notes are Green Accord, Clary Sage, Bergamot and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Herbal Notes, Chamomile, Dates, Beeswax, Poppy and Carnation; base notes are Cypress, Frankincense, Fir, Exotic Woods and Elm.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Viridarium was the name given to the gardens of patrician villas in Ancient Rome, inspired by the gardeners’ creative urge to experiment in that period. Unusual juxtapositions from worlds apart such as silver fir and the Date palm nestle close to shrubs, trees and flowers.
The Viridarium of Livia from 1 B.C., the stunningly preserved alfresco in the National Roman Museum, provided the inspiration for Maria Candida’s latest olfactory creation. A contemplation of the work led to the compilation of a list with all its botanical elements and which Maria Candida then used to create her eponymous homage to the original, amalgamating seemingly disparate olfactory notes and culminating in a liminal space suspended between our ancestral past and her divergent current style.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The House of Guerlain invites you to its holiday rendezvous in a numbered edition: Imagine Guerlain, in collaboration with the Turkish jewelry designer Begüm Khan. To celebrate a joyful and festive holiday season with splendor and imagination, Begüm Khan has chosen a fantasy in keeping with Guerlain’s world, which is also rich in animal iconography. For the 2023 Millésime, the iconic Bee Bottle is adorned with a unique jewel, an imperial bee at the heart of a radiant golden flower, immortalizing the magic of suspended time. This exceptional piece holds a precious amber-colored nectar for a festive trail. Exclusively available on Guerlain.com and in Guerlain boutiques.
Begüm Khan has imagined an enchanting bee-flower duo. At the heart of an asymmetric eminently poetic design, the bee is majestically showcased by 37 sparkling hand-set pavé gems. She has crafted this decoration in 24-carat gold-plated bronze. Each adornment is hand-crafted in the artist’s Istanbul ateliers. Meticulous artistic craftsmanship that makes each piece unique.
This precious rendezvous is the result of a shared inspiration drawn from the perfect beauty of nature. This year, the two Houses explore together the sublimation of bestiary. Symbol of the House since 1853, the bee is an exceptional pollinator, particularly offering the world the finest flowers that give perfumers the richest of palettes to compose extraordinary fragrances. The iconic Bee Bottle is adorned in an imperial bee set at the heart of a voluptuous and sparkling flower.
“I choose the bee because the iconic animal of Guerlain, the real queen, is the bee.”
BEGÜM KHAN
This limited and numbered edition of 4,515 pieces of 125mL is presented with a 30mL travel spray and a funnel to pour the fragrance into the spray.
