perfumes_data.name: Tutti Twilly d'Hermès Hermès for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Tutti Twilly d'Hermès by Hermès is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Tutti Twilly d'Hermès was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christine Nagel. Top note is Litchi; middle note is Ginger flower; base note is Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Created by Christine Nagel for the girls of Hermès, the Tutti Twilly d'Hermès Eau de Parfum is a tribute to their free spirit, characterized by audacity and lightness, and their versatility. The name of the Twilly d'Hermès perfume family refers to Hermès' silk scarves: the twilly, a cheerful, colorful scarf that can be worn in many ways, is based on Hermès' square scarves made of silk twill.
A floral and fruity fragrance with a generous character, acquired with sweet ginger flowers, soft lychee, and enveloping musk.
The emblematic lantern bottle, designed by Florence Manlik, has a square shape and is decorated with an inverted lychee-red gradient. The white cap is adorned with a silk ribbon designed by Carine Brancowitz. Each silk ribbon is hand-knotted and unique.
Available as a 15, 30, 50 and 85 ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: New York (Gabriela Hearst) Fueguia 1833 for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: New York (Gabriela Hearst) by Fueguia 1833 is a Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. New York (Gabriela Hearst) was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Julian Bedel. Top notes are Nutmeg, Balsam Fir and Black Pepper; middle notes are Cherry Blossom, Tobacco and Rose; base notes are Woody Notes, Virginian Cedar, Palo Santo, Musk, Maple, Jacaranda, Patchouli, Vanilla and Tonka.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Fashion designer Gabriela Hearst teamed up with Fueguia's founder and perfumer to launch two fragrances called New York and Paysandú. Paysandou and New York each have their own aromatic signatures, shaped and inspired by Gabriela Hirst's two geographical regions and stages of life. They were created to be read individually and as a progression.
"Working with Julian on this project of 2 years has been thrilling. It combines my life so far, half with my roots in Paysandú and half in New York. Childhood memories and landscapes (for Paysandú) and the strength of womanhood (for New York) are combined with the alchemy of science and the pheromone potion that Julian crafted. Julian is hungry for knowledge." - Gabriela Hearst.
"New York draws its inspiration from the movement from South to North, weaving floral and notas dulces with typical North American woods. It’s a smokier, heavier, and more aged version of the spirit of the rural and herbal Paysandú.
Based on the research of two Nobel prizes, Leopold Ruzicka – who during the mid-1920’s studied the molecular structure of musk— and Linda B. Buck – awarded in 2004 alongside Richard Axel, for their discoveries in scent as a code and a subtle form of communication through volatile molecules— Julian Bedel developed this idea of musk as a language, an amplifier of one’s scent. This compound of pheromone messengers helps volatilize the aroma of skin. As a result, each individual’s aromatic identity gets amplified and gives a distinctive character to each perfume. Ultimately, each person will have a different version of the scent. An exclusive formula of Fueguia’s musk of plant origin was developed both for Paysandú and New York.
True to Fueguia’s mission of botanical research and scientific innovation, the ingredients that compose Paysandú were produced in Fueguia Botany in Manantiales, Uruguay. Marcela and Carqueja, ingredients that had never been used in perfumery, were extracted through Super Critical CO2 at Fueguia’s unique high-end facilities and are what gives a significant part of the unique character of the scent. Marcela, traditionally used by the Charrúas people as a medicinal plant, is still a symbol of this cultural heritage in Brazil, Paraguay, Uruguay, and Argentina."
String
Tonic: Balsam Fir
Main Note: Tobacco
Sub-vocal: Jacaranda wood
Melody
Maple Resin, Virginia Cedar, Vanilla, Rose Original, Cherry Blossom, Black Pepper, Palo Santo, Patchouli, Tonka Bean, Nutmeg
Available as a 100ml Perfume.

perfumes_data.name: Archangels Caeleste Parfums for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Archangels by Caeleste Parfums is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Archangels was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Cristiano Canali.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
A realm cloaked in Divine Light, where winged guardians watch over humanity. This is the domain of the Archangels.
A place where the essence of the great leaders Michael and Gabriel dance in an eternal ballet of protection and revelation.
This is the world that awaits you! A fragrance that is more than just a mere blend – it’s a portal to the celestial, a secret passage that will lead you to a place of strength, wisdom, and enlightenment.
Now, you might be thinking, “How can a perfume transport me to such a mystical plane?”
The answer lies in the power of the Archangels themselves.
Gabriel, “God’s Strength,” is the divine messenger who unveils profound truths and heralds messages of hope.
His presence is like a gentle hand guiding you through life’s labyrinth, a soft melody playing on the strings of your soul.
But Gabriel is not alone in this fragrant alliance.
Michael, the celestial warrior lends his power to this blend.
His fiery courage blazes against the darkness, and his strength courses through every note of this elixir.
When you wear it, you’ll feel as if you’re standing shielded by Michael’s unwavering resolve, enveloped in an invisible armor against fear and temptation.
Together, these Archangels create an inspiring alliance, a scented veil of protection and wisdom that will leave you feeling empowered and enlightened.
This is more than just a scent. It’s not just a daily ritual; it’s a transformative experience that connects you to Heaven.
Are you ready to embark on this olfactory odyssey? To step into a world where Heaven meets Earth, and where the very essence of the Divine is captured in a bottle?
Start your journey into the celestial!

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The fragrance is a tangled wind that whips us into the known unknown.
Invigorating grapefruit and ginger are met by the calming embrace of eucalyptus, chamomile, and rose absolute– grounded by a natural, woody base.

perfumes_data.name: Peanut DS&Durga for women and men

Top note is Peanut; middle notes are Peanut and Gourmand Accord; base notes are Woody Notes, Earthy Notes, Vetiver and Grass.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"The beauty of bold Virginia nuts ensconced in sandy soils and fields of crumbling shells.
America’s favorite nut (I know - legume), peanut is rarely used in perfume. But all parts of the plant are interesting to me. The soft dirty shells, the fatty earthy nut, the dark skins, the leaves in the field. I took an accord of peanut, expanded it with soft strokes of gourmand notes, earthy tones, toasty woods, a grassy vetyver. It’s a drive through fields of dried plants and soft shells, but really it’s all about the nut!"
Available as a 50ml EDP.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Inspired by modern times when animalic ingredients are banned and natural floral materials are highly restricted. Let us dive into the wicked beauty of both.
Top notes: skunk oil, grapefruit, and hemp flower oil
Heart notes: jasmine sambac, raani flower, and Indian sandalwood
Base notes: patchouli, cedar, benzoin, vetiver, turmeric, vanilla, ginger, coriander, and Indonesian lime

perfumes_data.name: Paradise Soil Areej Le Doré for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Paradise Soil by Areej Le Doré is a Woody Floral Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Paradise Soil was launched in 2024. perfumes_data.detailed_description:
It is reported in the sound narrations from the final messenger of God about Paradise that "its soil is musk" and "its soil is saffron." Those two marvelous ingredients are presented in this floriental gourmand composition.
Top notes: Azerbaijan rose from 1972, jasmine grandiflorum, ylang, and vintage deer musk pods (grains and skins)
Heart notes: tuberose, raani flower, Siberian deer musk, cocoa, and saffron
Base notes: aged Cambodian oud, Indian and Indonesian sandalwood

perfumes_data.name: Oud Taiwan Areej Le Doré for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Oud Taiwan by Areej Le Doré is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oud Taiwan was launched in 2024. Top notes are Green Leaves and Indole; middle notes are Oud and Boronia; base notes are Spices, Amber, Sandalwood, Musk and Seaweed.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Oud Taiwan is an exquisite fragrance inspired by extraordinary oud oil distilled from highly matured oud, naturally grown in Taiwan. The composition opens with a bitter green leaves accord, full of vibrant verdant and slightly fresh nuances, with a tropical indolic touch. The heart notes feature extremely condensed, matured, and complex Taiwan oud radiating a bitter green medicinal aura, enhanced by boronia absolute. The base notes include smoky and leathery fossil amber, seaweed, spices, sandalwood, and animalic musks, creating a vision of tropical mossy woods and a photorealistic transportation to a night jungle.

The nose behind this fragrance is Russian Adam. Top notes are Siberian Pine, Bergamot, Lime and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Natural Musk, Galbanum, Cypress, Spices, Orange Blossom and Sandalwood; base notes are Musk, Patchouli, Amber, Assam Oud and Australian Blue Cypress.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The time has come to visit one of the purest, wildest, and least known locations on earth: Siberia. Join us on a rare journey and experience the most rare natural aromatic: Musk.
Top notes: bergamot, lime, mandarin, and Siberian smoky pine
Heart notes: a maceration made from legally obtained wild Siberian deer musk grains, orange blossom, Indian sandalwood from the year 2000, galbanum, cypress and a variety of spices
Base notes: sweet Assam agarwood oil, blue cypress absolute, patchouli, musk accord from the 1980s and crude amber oil from 1906.

Cosmic Power is a luxurious and opulent symphony of spices.
Its unique and distinctive trail derives from the powerful combination of bold black pepper oil, divine cinnamon bark oil and fresh woody elemi oil. The exquisite union of precious rose ultimate, mystical amber, ancient frankincense accord and enchanting vanilla bean extract creates the warm, spicy and addictive signature of the fragrance.

Beneath the glossy surface blooms the irrepressible mystery of a dark peony accord."

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Shining Moon marks the fifth addition to Perris Monte Carlo's Gold Collection. Radiant, enchanting, and intensely captivating, this fragrance seamlessly blends floral and soft woody notes to unveil a sophisticated aroma. It captures the luminosity of a magical moment, an emotion bathed in the radiant glow of the moon.
The fragrance starts with a fresh and luminous burst of pink pepper, before transitioning into a floral heart composed of magnolia, jasmine, and rose, grounded by a base of cedar and sandalwood. The composition is further enriched with the subtle accents of cashmeran, Iso E Super, and musk.
Available as a 100 ml EDP.

perfumes_data.name: Aqua Regia Xerjoff for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Aqua Regia by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Aqua Regia was launched in 2023. Top notes are Leather, Black Currant and Calabrian bergamot; middle notes are Violet, Orris Root, Singapore Patchouli and Caramel; base notes are Cedar, Musk and Madagascar Vanilla.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Alchemy is an influential philosophical traditional from antiquity – the magic sense of transformation. Based on this philosophy, Kemi is the collection of unique perfumes created from pure natural raw elements through cryptic distillation techniques. Perfume as we know it could not have taken shape without alchemic studies and practices or skilfully converting ordinary inputs into noble substances. Kemi straddles the line between the tangible and the intangible, the earthly and the ethereal, the real and the magical.
Aqua Regia evokes all that is noble in the alchemic world. Conjuring up the dazzle of gold and the resilience of platinum, it casts a powerful spell over everything it touches. Dignified and masterful, this unique scent blends distinctive eucalyptus with fresh bergamot, vetiver and rose. Kemi is a collection of perfumes created from natural raw elements using innovative distillation techniques.
OLFACTORY NOTES

perfumes_data.name: Kiaana Angel Afnan for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Kiaana Angel by Afnan is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Kiaana Angel was launched in 2024. Top notes are Pistachio, Ice cream and Bergamot; middle notes are White Peach, Raspberry, Pear and Jasmine; base notes are Tonka, Sandalwood and Cedarwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Embark on a journey through a mystical garden filled with enchanting fragrances. The Kiaana Collection invites you to explore the depths of your emotions, from the celestial innocence of Kiaana Angel to the passionate allure of Kiaana Crush.

Kiaana Angel: Step into a celestial garden where dreams take flight. This delicate and ethereal fragrance opens with a burst of sweet and citrusy notes, followed by a bouquet of jasmine, raspberry, white peach, and pear. The base notes of cedarwood, sandalwood, and tonka bean provide a comforting and sensual foundation, leaving a lasting impression of ethereal elegance.

perfumes_data.name: Russian Oud II Areej Le Doré for women and men

Russian Oud is a gourmand oud lover's dream. It is a perfume built around a chocolaty agarwood oil distilled in India according to an old traditional method.
Top notes: a touch of natural deer musk and ambergris
Heart notes: cacao and Indian oud
Base notes: resins and cedar

perfumes_data.name: Cuirtis Areej Le Doré for women and men

Top notes are Castoreum, Osmanthus, Cumin and juniper berry; middle notes are Castoreum, Birch Tar, Orris, Vanilla, Geranium and Rose; base notes are Russian Leather, Castoreum, Oud, Violet Leaf and Oakmoss.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Step into an autumn forest full of a wild and leathery aroma. This composition is focused on beaver extracts and executed in a vintage style. It brings together all the nuances of animalic leather, from vintage tar oil, Indian oud, and smoky birch tar to narcotic osmanthus. Cuirtis is where the forest meets leather.
Top notes: Russian castoreum, USA beaver tail oil, osmanthus, cumin, and juniper berry
Heart notes: birch tar, parijat flower, vintage geranium, rose, aged co-tincture of orris, vanilla, and USA castoreum
Base notes: tar oil from circa 1920s, vintage-style cuir de Russie accord, Manipur oud from 2005, Canadian castoreum, oakmoss, and violet leaf absolute

perfumes_data.name: Karl Lagerfeld Rouge Karl Lagerfeld for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Karl Lagerfeld Rouge by Karl Lagerfeld is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Karl Lagerfeld Rouge was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Romain Almairac. Top notes are Black Currant, Pear and Peach; middle notes are Patchouli, Jasmine and Orange Blossom; base notes are Cashmere Wood, Ambroxan, Vanilla and Caramel.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Nearly a decade later, the legendary scent by Karl Lagerfeld makes a comeback under the new form "Rouge," a nod to one of the designer's most cherished colors.
Crafted by perfumer Romain Almairac of Robertet, the fragrance is described as "distinct, contemporary, and enthralling." Almairac drew inspiration from Karl Lagerfeld's multifaceted creative world, where varying realms merge to form intriguing contrasts. This theme of duality is woven into the essence of the new Eau de Parfum, marrying traditional influences with a modern, cutting-edge flair.
At its outset, Rouge captivates with a radiant blend of jasmine, orange blossom, and patchouli. This initial freshness evolves into a rich medley of peach, pear, and blackcurrant notes. The scent's foundation is a luxurious mix of cashmere wood and ambroxan, enriched with smooth vanilla and caramel for a cozy, gentle conclusion. The fragrance achieves a harmonious balance, offering a surprising yet cohesive aromatic experience.
Top notes: blackcurrant, pear, peach
Middle notes: jasmine, orange blossom, patchouli
Base notes: ambroxan, vanilla, cashmere wood, caramel
The fragrance's vessel retains the iconic, timeless architecture of the original Karl Lagerfeld Pour Femme Eau de Parfum bottle: a sleek glass structure topped with a clear lid, accented by a spiked metal ring. The bottle undergoes a striking transformation with the addition of a mesmerizing red hue, adorned with the renowned Karl Lagerfeld emblem and the "rouge" inscription in a contemporary, graffiti-inspired typeface.
Available as 45ml and 85ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Calm Bliss Charlotte Tilbury for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Calm Bliss by Charlotte Tilbury is a Floral Aquatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Calm Bliss was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Anne Flipo. Top notes are Neroli, Lavender and Bergamot; middle notes are Water Notes and Orange Blossom; base notes are Cashmere Wood, Palo Santo, Ambergris and Olibanum.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Calm Bliss gently manifests tranquillity and serenity, illuminated by the sparkling, precious neroli oil that provides a fresh and floral facet to the fragrance.
The peacefulness is embodied by the scent of natural lavandin which gives it a distinctive floral and aromatic character. It evokes a beautiful, tranquil aroma which perfectly combines with the weightlessness of the watery accord. Orris concrete has flowery facets, with very powdery notes, and a dry woody-root nuance that, combined with the softness of white musks, creates the innocence in Calm Bliss.

perfumes_data.name: Bangla Yasaman Isabelle Larignon for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Bangla Yasaman by Isabelle Larignon is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Bangla Yasaman was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Isabelle Larignon. Top notes are Buchu or Agathosma, Cardamom, Lemon, Bitter Orange and Bergamot; middle notes are Jasmine, Osmanthus, Celery Seeds, Clary Sage and Saffron; base notes are Indole, Tobacco, Fir, Peru Balsam and Vanilla.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: For this formula, I had fun doing my job as an illusionist, building a jasmine accord from scratch, then dressing it up with spices and accentuating the celery facet of the cis-jamone. Like curry and immortelle, celery essence reminds me of the warm, sensual scent of skin. And at certain times of the day, jasmine exudes animalic, even visceral facets that are heady and intoxicating. I wanted to highlight these, as well as the tobacco and cold, slightly metallic ashes of jasmine Grandiflorum. I created a jasmine hybrid that has the fruity, animalic aspects of Sambac and the green, tobacco-like qualities of Grandiflorum. The accord is soft ened and warmed by Peruvian balsam supported by green vanilla. Cardamom adds a fresh, creamy top note. Osmanthus flower provides natural support for the leathery and stable notes of paracresol, while adding the velvety smoothness of apricot skin.

perfumes_data.name: Solar Power Phlur for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Solar Power by Phlur is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Solar Power was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Greg Husar. Top notes are Blood Mandarin, Bergamot and Jasmine; middle notes are Neroli and Orange Blossom; base notes are Solar Notes, Sea Salt, Musk and Driftwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Golden. Glowing. Glistening.

Bathed in brilliance, Solar Power is a golden floral musk composition that exudes the sensuality of salty, sun-kissed skin. Opening with a sparkling burst of bold citrus notes of Bergamot and Red Mandarin, Solar Power is illuminated by a warm solar floral accord of Neroli, Jasmine, and Orange Flower and wrapped in a comforting blend of Musk, Driftwood, and Sea Salt.
"Solar Power is the epitome of sensual luminosity in a bottle…it is inspired by the diffusive glow of sunlight."
Greg Husar, Solar Power Perfumer.

perfumes_data.name: Absolue Not Your Rose Lancôme for women
perfumes_data.short_description: Absolue Not Your Rose by Lancôme is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Absolue Not Your Rose was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Caroline Dumur.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Hidden in the winter mist, she is not your rose. Cold and mysterious, she cannot be possessed. Almost impossible to reach, it belongs to nature. Surviving the winter frost, enveloped in soft musk, it exudes aquatic freshness.
The vision of the Master Perfumer, Caroline Dumur:
"Hidden in the winter mist, the rose is both fresh, almost cold and sensual, tinged with mystery. [...] an enigmatic accord that takes us back to that ephemeral moment, just after the rain, [...] highlighted by musk, gently iridescent."
THE DOMAIN OF THE ROSE: THE CULTURE OF AN INIMITABLE ROSE, ON THE EARTH WHERE NATURE LIVES IN THE WILD STATE
Discover Absolue Les Parfums, the first haute perfumery collection dedicated to the rose grown at the heart of our estate: the Centifolia Rose. Composed of 11 exceptional juices, it reveals an exclusive rose like you've never smelled before.
THE REINVENTION OF THE ICONIC INGREDIENT OF PERFUMERY
Our Master Perfumers have freed themselves from the classic olfactory pyramid and invented a new way of constructing a perfume with the halo construction. The rose becomes the heart of an olfactory symphony. Each perfume in the Absolue Les Parfums collection is born from the fusion of the exclusive Lancôme rose and an element of nature emblematic of the rose domain.

Immerse yourself in the captivating aura of this smoky fragrance—an opulent olfactory experience that unfolds in layers. Opening with top notes of oud, smoke, and the sweet embrace of maple syrup, it sets the stage for a journey into luxury. As the scent evolves into its heart, a rich blend of sandalwood, guaiac wood, cedarwood, vanilla, and a hint of cotton candy creates a luxurious and comforting symphony.
Finally, it gracefully settles into a base of amber, labdanum, vanilla, and musk, leaving you with a super-warm and enduring closure that lingers for long hours.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
An ode to life itself.
The essence of life's fleeting beauty intertwines with the enigmatic allure of shadows, akin to a
delicate whisper of freshness hinting at an infinite inner journey.
As citruses and blooming florals dance with dark, creamy woods, this fragrance becomes a timeless
ode—a fragrant celebration of life's brilliance, reminiscent of the profound dance of existence.
Much like a beckoning sea nourishing fantasies of total freedom, LUMINOIR encapsulates a fragrant
tale, inviting hearts to open wide, like wings deployed for flight, towards the mysterious harmony of
light and darkness.
Top:
Italian Bergamot, Japanese Green Tea, Lemon Verveine
Heart:
Fig Nectar, Night Blooming Jasmine, Black Cardamom, Tunisian Neroli
Base:
Ginger CO₂, Tree-Moss, Hawaiian Sandalwood, Tiaré Flower

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Come with us to the deep past, when the royal palaces of the Russian Empire were surrounded by naked nature and hand-made houses and barns in the wilderness. This is a civet and oud driven floriental chypre that takes us to the wildest corners of our history.
Top notes: mandarin leaves, vintage Indian civet, and artemisia
Heart notes: co-distillation of several flowers, including palmarosa, rose, jasmine, tagetes, and champaka
Base notes: black truffles, fresh Ethiopian civet, tonka beans, vanilla, Bhutan oud oil, hay absolute, and cedarwood

perfumes_data.name: Weon Spiritica for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Weon by Spiritica is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Weon was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Daniele Muratori Caputo. Top notes are Pisco Sour cocktal and Coca; middle notes are Ice cream, Mint, Milk, Vanilla and Copahu Balm; base notes are Ozonic notes, Sea Salt, Metallic notes and Earthy Notes.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
We are in the Valley of the Moon, a ghostly, mystical and unusual landscape in northern Chile.
The warmth of the red earth blends with the alcoholic reminiscence of the Pisco sour (a typical South American cocktail) and the bitter notes of coca leaves (a plant that is legally and habitually used by the native populations to
make up for the lack of energy due to the high altitude of the Andean plateau).
Numerous paranormal phenomena of the most disparate nature occur here. WEON, an ancient word coming from the Indian language, and widely used throughout Chile: its primary meaning is that of "friendship". A bit like saying
"compà" in southern Italy.

Weon is a hymn to the spiritual mysteries of a memorable place that can generate very strong internal shocks.
The subsoil of the Atacama desert is rich in lithium, a mineral used in drugs that stabilize mood. In the sky of this red desert, it is common to observe lights and strange shapes moving quickly in space. A specific area of this desert has been used to listen to the "sounds of the universe" through numerous receptive phono dishes, the purpose of which is to go in search of the primordial sound of the bigbang, or perhaps, who knows what other unknown mysteries.

Ange Noir XXI, a fragrance that exudes sexiness and mystery, epitomizes allure and fascination. With its seductive aroma and enigmatic character, this fragrance invites you into captivating intrigue and undeniable sensuality.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The olfactory identity of BORDERLINE NEROLI takes inspiration by the struggle for balancing the self-image and sense of self.
THE FIGHT BETWEEN TWO OPPOSITE WHITE FLOWERS: the clean kindness of NATURAL NEROLI against the violence of NATURAL TUBEROSE essential oils.
The first is supported by a COMFORTABLE SOAPY CLEAN SMELL of NATURAL BERGAMOT CALABRIA OIL, while the second is sharpened by a GREEN FRUITY note of FIG.

We have taken inspiration from an aspect of the Borderline Personality Disorder which is the struggle for balancing the self-image and sense of self.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
In the realm where harmony reigns, Principalities weave mystical enchantment.
Over earth and fire, through the air’s embrace, they guide nature’s dance with celestial grace.
Born from Heaven’s decree, the fragrance captures divine alchemy’s essence.
The wind’s whisper, the Sun’s warmth, and the Earth’s heartbeat, all guided by unseen hands.
Custodians of the natural order, the Principalities orchestrate life’s symphony with divine precision.
Each drop of this cosmic dance offers wearers a profound connection to these forces.
Capturing the world’s beauty, the scent harmonizes melodies of the Earth, resonating with nature’s rhythm.
A connection to the primal, the profound, the eternal.
Journey through emerald forests echoing with forgotten wisdom, across sapphire stars brimming with untold tales – and into the fiery heart of creation where light and power connect.
A bridge between the tangible and ethereal, this elixir connects you to the primal forces shaping our existence.
Embrace the dance of elements.

perfumes_data.name: Sexorcism Grammatik Drammatik for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Redefine the rules with Sexorcism. You don't sit around crying, you get up and move on to seduction. You skip all the steps after a breakup and start over. Leave behind those who could not appreciate you. With this fragrant mix of salted caramel, rebellious benzoin and exciting musk, you're sure to find someone who will. It's time for Sexorcism.

It starts with fresh Red Fruits, Citrusy notes, Ylang-ylang, and Blackcurrant, reminiscent of a forest at dawn. The heart weaves together Jasmine, Peach, Tuberose, and Orange Blossom. It ends with a rich balance between Oriental, Vanilla, Musks, Patchouli, and Woody notes, providing a deep, lasting fragrance.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"An olfactive postcard from an island vacation, Isola Sol is a sublime new art-piece from the vision of Roja Dove. Capturing a snapshot of a blissful day spent on a golden beach, Isola Sol embraces that magical moment the sun is at its highest in the sky, turning the scenery into a watercolour of orange and blues. Tempting you to a land where the sun always shines, surrounding yourself with the scent of Isola Sol means you don’t have to long for a summer holiday."
Key Notes: Citrus, Apricot, Peach, Jasmine, Ylang Ylang, Coconut, Sandal Wood, Salt
Top Notes: Lemon, Bergamot, Mandarin, Petitgrain, Apricot, Peach
Heart Notes: Neroli, Jasmine Sambac, Ylang Ylang, Coconut

“A scorching sun in a cloudless sky, a radiant glow of Mandarin, Apricot and Peach open onto rays of Oriental which shine throughout the day. With its ability to evoke the sensation of warm skin, a base of Sandalwood becomes silken by a note of creamy Coconut, as a touch of Pink Pepper adds the rosy heat of sun-kissed cheeks. Caressing the shoreline, a breeze of Salt air carries upon it the heady fragrance of succulent fruits and tropical flowers.” - Roja Dove.
Available as 50 ml Parfum.

perfumes_data.short_description: Shihab by Spirit Of Kings is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Shihab was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Christian Provenzano. Top notes are Pink Pepper, Raspberry, Peach, Bergamot and Apple; middle notes are Rose, Patchouli, Jasmine and Cedarwood; base notes are Amber, Sandalwood, Vanilla, Tonka and Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Shihab, the latest addition to Spirit of Kings' Gold Collection, takes its name from the Arabic word for "shooting star," symbolizing the fleeting beauty and wonder of this celestial phenomenon. This fragrance embodies the serene elegance of a summer evening in a royal garden, where the air is filled with the intoxicating aroma of ripe fruits as the day gently fades into night.
The composition begins with a bright, invigorating blend of raspberries, pink pepper, peach, apple, and bergamot, creating an uplifting and vibrant introduction. As the scent evolves, the heart unveils an opulent mix of Turkish rose, jasmine, patchouli, and cedarwood, adding depth and floral sophistication. The fragrance concludes with warm, sensual base notes of sandalwood, musk, amber, tonka, and vanilla, leaving a long-lasting, comforting impression reminiscent of a golden summer sunset.
In the heart of a majestic kingdom, as the king strolls through his lavish garden at twilight, the sweet scent of ripening raspberries fills the air. In this tranquil moment, he gazes upon the sky and witnesses the magic of a shooting star—Shihab—gracing the evening horizon. Though brief, the moment is one of peace and wonder, forever etched in his memory.
Shihab encapsulates this enchanting experience through its intricate blend of fruity and floral notes. The lush raspberry opening is elevated by a hint of pink pepper's spice, while the floral heart of Turkish rose and jasmine evokes the refined beauty of a twilight garden. The warmth of amber, musk, and patchouli in the base lingers like the fading light of a summer day, creating a fragrance that is both timeless and regal.
The vibrant hue of orange, symbolizing creativity, joy, and energy, is an ideal reflection of Shihab’s essence. Evoking the warmth of a sunset and the sweetness of ripe raspberries, orange captures the scent’s youthful and refreshing character. The fragrance is further adorned with an orange sapphire, a gemstone representing happiness, love, and wisdom. This radiant jewel adds a touch of luxury and vibrance, mirroring the playful yet majestic qualities of Shihab.
More than just a perfume, Shihab is a sensory journey through the splendor of a summer evening, captured in a fleeting yet unforgettable moment beneath a shooting star. Ideal for those seeking a harmonious blend of freshness, floral grace, and lasting warmth, Shihab is a celebration of nature’s transient beauty and timeless allure.

Vanilla Tincture India, an ingredient explicitly created for Vanilla Sex, exudes a soft sensuality. Vanilla reveals a pristine glamour, warmed by mysterious florals and bitter almond essence. A timeless sandalwood quality mingles with enticing tonka absolute and an exquisite Ultravanil™ molecule.
A Symphony of Vanilla Notes:
Notes:  Vanilla Tincture, Vanilla Absolute, Floral Notes, Bitter Almond, Sandalwood, Tonka Bean Absolute, Ultravanil®
Available in 30ml and 50ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Sunny woody
As the morning sun gently warms the woods, Seekwood effortlessly guides you into a brand-new day. Skillfully crafted by perfumer Spyros Drosopolous, Seekwood embodies the essence of carefree living. With a woody base of santalol (sandalwood), cedarwood, and papyrus, Seekwood is stylishly spiced up with natural Greek saffron and sensual myrrh. The vibrant presence of orange flower and osmanthus illuminates each drop with an energizing glow, sun-kissed and sophisticated.

perfumes_data.short_description: Crema Limone by Profumi Di Polignano is a Citrus Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Crema Limone was launched in 2024. perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Crema Limone is a gourmand citrus fragrance that tells stories of sweetness and freshness. An olfactory cuddle that envelops you thanks to its soft and creamy notes that bring back old childhood memories. Lemon and orange zest evoke an explosion of freshness, enriched by the softness of vanilla and almond milk. The delicious notes of brown sugar and caramel leave an indelible memory on the skin.
When telling the stories of a place we come across distant flavors that our grandparents tell. So it was with that charming dessert that once accompanied the "Special Coffee" in Polignano, a delicacy of the village since 1920. An extraordinary ice cream, a delight for adults and children, made by enriching the flavor of the cream with delicate Polignano a Mare lemons.

perfumes_data.name: Love by Kilian Amber and Oud Special Blend 2023 By Kilian for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Love by Kilian Amber and Oud Special Blend 2023 by By Kilian is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Love by Kilian Amber and Oud Special Blend 2023 was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Calice Becker. Top notes are Tunisian Orange Blossom, Marshmallow and Bulgarian Rose; middle notes are Amber, Resins and Spices; base notes are Amber, Agarwood (Oud) and Akigalawood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Each year, Kilian launches a limited edition of one of its most popular and emblematic fragrances, Love, Don't Be Shy. The Special Blend edition of 2023 captures the essence of home and heritage with the legend of the inspiring Middle East, oud resonating with a vibrant amber accord.
Love, Don't Be Shy AMBER & OUD Special Blend 2023 highlights the rich and diverse facets of oud oil. This year's blend begins with bright Bulgarian rose oil and orange blossom absolute from Morocco, blooming with refinement and sensuality into the unforgettably delicious marshmallowy accord. In this heart begins the opening notes of a rich ambery accord, boldly with intensified spices and resins. Oriental and oud are the core resonance with a touch of akigalawood. The composition is signed by perfumer Calice Becker.
 
Notes: Accord of Oud, Accord of Oriental, Rose essence, Akigalawood.
The fragrance is available as a 50 ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.short_description: Euphoria Eau de Toilette (2023) by Calvin Klein is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Euphoria Eau de Toilette (2023) was launched in 2023. Euphoria Eau de Toilette (2023) was created by Anne Flipo, Dominique Ropion and Fanny Bal. Top notes are Raspberry Leaf, Mirabelle and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Orchid, Rose and Guava blossom; base notes are Crystal Amber, Cashmeran and Vanilla.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Calvin Klein Euphoria (the version from 2023) is created by perfumers Anne Flipo, Dominique Ropion and Fanny Bal. It is described as a refreshed version of the legendary Euphoria fragrance from 2005, which, like its predecessors, is still fresh, youthful and exciting.
Inspired by feminine sensuality, Calvin Klein Euphoria Eau de Toilette bursts with freshness. Mixing top notes of mirabelle plum with a radiant orchid heart and a warm and airy vanilla base, this is announced as an amber gourmand scent with fruits and flowers.
Expressing the essence of female sensuality and desire, youthful and feminine, rich yet weightless, Calvin Klein Euphoria Eau de Toilette draws inspiration from the original. However, it is a modern interpretation. It is made with natural ingredients including rose essence - responsibly grown and Fair Trade certified.
Top notes: Mirabelle plum, pink pepper, wild raspberry leaf 
Heart: radiant orchid accord, rose, guava blossom 
Base: airy vanilla accord, crystal amber, cashmeran
The fragrance comes in a renewed transparent glass version of the iconic bottle, revealing the delicate, morning dew-inspired pink shade of the scent.
Calvin Klein Euphoria Eau de Toilette (2023) is available in bottles of 30, 50 and 100 ml.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Dubai is a vibrant and culturally diverse city with amazing scents and experiences. One fragrance that captures the essence of this city is Haramain Amber Oud Gold 999.9, Dubai Edition. As you take in the city's amazing sights and smells, the fragrance begins to unfold like a journey through time. Each note reveals a different aspect of Dubai's rich heritage. From the top notes of pear, orange, bergamot, and lemon to the heartwarming scent of melon, pear, jasmine, cardamom, caramel, and green apple, every note is a chapter in the captivating story of this metropolis. And, as you breathe in the grounding base notes of amber, vanilla, patchouli, and cedarwood, you'll feel a sense of rootedness amidst the excitement. It's a scent that invites you to immerse yourself in its captivating story and discover the true essence of Dubai.

Your lingering signature is a sumptuous breeze of golden vanilla, exquisite woods and gentle powdery musks as Shaghaf Oud Ahmar leaves the unique memory of you in its wake.

Dreams inspire our creativity, they surround us with images, memories and sensations. Les Eaux Rêvées expresses this imagination, where inspirations from different generations come together, collide and complement each other - the d'Ornan family,
SISLEY. SUNSHINE FRESH JASMINE
Rêvée d'Isa is the depth and lightness of a seductive dream. Full of contrasts, it links a magical blend of essences with an alchemy that is both obvious and surprising at the same time. perfumes_data.name: Fétiche L’Ambre Christian Louboutin for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Fétiche L’Ambre by Christian Louboutin is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Fétiche L’Ambre was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Delphine Lebeau.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
She appears on the street.  A vision of subtle sensuality. One by one, heads turn, unable to look away. Hypnotized by her allure, yearning to get closer, to move alongside her, skin to skin.
In her presence, the air feels just a little warmer. The addictive aphrodisiac amber swirls off her bare skin and through the air, luring in everyone in her path. The smell of narcotic white tuberose tangles itself into the mix, like a carnal embrace.
Everywhere she wanders, she leaves a trail of lust and passion in her wake. Her secret?
Fétiche L’Ambre by Christian Louboutin.
Fétiche L’Ambre is a fragrance that reinterprets the classic amber signature with an unexpected clash of green freshness, contrasted by patchouli. This scent combines dark amber and tuberose, creating a heady and hypnotic aroma. The warm, narcotic amber wraps around the green floral facets of tuberose, offering a vision of subtle sensuality.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Essence Of Casablanca was inspired by the breath-taking city that rises from the desert sands of its heritage. When you wear Essence of Casablanca, you become a part of it. Its beauty is undeniable. Its elegance is assured. The legend is eternal.
Essence of Casablanca opens with a tempting array of ripe fruits, beckoning you into this scented world. Apples and grapes offer color, juice and sweetness. You follow their beguiling scent towards intense patchouli and precious iris root. The fragrance surrounds you like the splendor of the city that inspired it; abundance, richness and grandeur combined. This intense heartbeat quickens until it is a steady, golden drum of sensual musk, deep, sweet balsams and a golden sunset of amber. Essence of Casablanca is a mystique to be discovered.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: 'I had a vision of Southern California as paradise when I was growing up on the east coast. This fragrance is inspired by best friends, uncomplicated things, and the feeling of pure joy and feels like butterfly kisses and sex on the beach. It contains notes of frangipani, green mandarin, coconut, and pineapple.
By Rosie Jane’s Eau de parfum is a blend of organic sugar cane alcohol and pure perfume oil. It is housed in a beautiful solid-glass bottle with a sprayer designed to give the perfect spritz every time. Missy Eau de Parfum is a very aromatic way to wear perfume.
Missy Eau de Parfum is sweet and sophisticated. Poolside hangs and weekends away, a youthful blend of white florals, tropical fruits, and a fresh-citrus veil of mandarin and amber. Familiar and nostalgic but bold and modern, Missy is happiness in a bottle.

perfumes_data.name: Uxalpha Tiziana Terenzi for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Uxalpha by Tiziana Terenzi is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Uxalpha was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Paolo Terenzi. Top notes are Sicilian Orange, Calabrian bergamot and Pink Grapefruit; middle notes are Coconut, Cedarwood, Labdanum and Musk; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Ambergris, Caramel and Indian Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Uxalpha, another wonder from the Luna collection, came to life on a May night when the pristine skies of Paolo and Tiziana’s hills revealed the secret of a shining star to them. The Alpha star in the Lynx constellation, the brightest in its celestial realm, shone with the energy of 700 suns, illuminating the darkness with a vibrant, infectious light. This enchanted experience provided the inspiration to create a fragrance that celebrates the vitality and radiance of souls that never cease to shine. Uxalpha is an ode to power and brilliance, dedicated to those who radiate light and vitality at all times. This essence captures the power of the Alpha star, taking the wearer on an olfactory journey that explores the energy and luminosity of the Lynx constellation. ThLikeits companion Ixbeta, the uniqueness of Uxalpha lies in its ability to blend with other fragrances in the constellation to create unique, inimitable combinations. When exploring the Lynx constellation, you will have the opportunity to discover the art of intergalactic layering, enjoying the astral fusion of the fragrances it inspired: Lince, Uxalpha, Ixbeta and Lincys. The top notes of Uxalpha open with a fresh explosion of Calabrian Bergamot, Sicilian Orange and Pink Grapefruit. This symphony of citrus fruits ignites the senses with its sparkling vivacity. At the heart of the fragrance, Cuban Cedarwood introduces a warm, enveloping woody note, while Mexican Coconut and Musk add an exotic sweetness. Italian Labdanum completes the heart with its resinous depth, evoking the magic of a tropical night under a starry sky. The base notes of Uxalpha offer a rich, complex foundation: Ambergris lends a warm, mysterious richness, while Madagascar Bourbon Vanilla and Turkish Caramel add a velvety, inviting sweetness. Indian Red Patchouli completes the blend with an earthy,intense note, creating an olfactory symphony that glows with warmth and passion. Uxalpha is an ode to light and inner vitality, a journey of the senses that celebrates the ability to radiate strength and beauty around the world.

Top Notes:
Calabrian Bergamot, Sicilian Orange & Pink Grapefruit
Heart Notes:
Cuban Cedarwood, Mexican Coconut, Musk & Italian Labdanum
Base Notes:
Ambergris, Madagascar Vanilla Bourbon, Turkish Caramel & Red Indian Patchouli

perfumes_data.name: Diamonitirion - elixir atonit Adi Ale Van for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Diamonitirion - elixir atonit by Adi Ale Van is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Diamonitirion - elixir atonit was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Giovanni Festa. Top notes are Lime, Pink Pepper and Cardamom; middle notes are Old Books, Candle Wax, Opoponax, Olibanum and Myrrh; base notes are Resin, Amber and Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
This project was created from the heart with a lot of faith.
The Diamonitirion is the name of the visa you need to pass on Mount Athos, that's why I called it the Gate to another world, the forbidden world or the Land of the Mother of God.
The shape chosen is not accidental, it represents the shape of an old cross in a country church, from a mountain village found during my walks in rural areas.
The shape of the crosses that ornate the cap and the box is also a very old romanian folkloric design, found in the country side.
The wooden and leather box design is inspired by vintage travel trunks.
Olfactory pyramid:
Pink pepper, lime, cardamom
Opoponax, olibanum incense, myrrh, candles, old books
Oriental, musk, resins
Adi ale Van supports finding, preserving and promoting old Romanian musical traditions and long-forgotten Romanian crafts from rural areas.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Amorous Intense has a captivating opening which is introduced through a unique blend of baked pear, pear pulp, almonds and apple sauce. Ottoman Empire is the essence of mysteries. It has a heart of extravagant richness, a character of unmatchable diversity and the blissful sensation of narcotic depth. Step into the past and experience the soul-healing impact, depth and mystery of Ottoman Empire.

perfumes_data.name: Sangria+Saffron Michael Malul London for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The Feeling: A man in a black suit opens the door as you walk into the city’s newest five-star restaurant. You pause to gaze at your reflection in the elaborate gold mirror in the entrance and touch up your deep burgundy lipstick before removing your suede jacket and taking a seat in the booth with your friends. You take a sip of cabernet, and a trace of your lipstick stains the rim of the glass – leaving a lasting impression.
The Fragrance: Sweet notes of sparkling orange, juicy green apple, and saffron soften into mid notes of raspberry nectar, jasmine petals, lily of the valley, and damask rose. Notes of ambergris and suede swirl together for a warm base layer.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
With Ambre Marine, Alyssa Ashley presents a marine fruity-fresh fragrance that awakens adventure. The marine composition opens in the top note with refreshing lemon and lotus aromas and a hint of peppermint, which are joined in the heart by water lily, orange blossom and floral notes of rose. In the base, amber, narcissus and iris ensure the scent has a slightly salty, individual and marine character.
Lemon, lotus, peppermint
water lily, orange blossom, rose

perfumes_data.name: Purple Powder Gallagher Fragrances for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Purple Powder by Gallagher Fragrances is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Purple Powder was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Daniel Gallagher.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"Containing nearly 50 ingredients, PURPLE POWDER is Daniel Gallagher’s most ambitious formula yet. He wanted to create a fragrance with many different layers, a concept which seems to be far removed from the relatively simplistic mainstream singular-enduring-note releases we experience in vast quantities today. Nothing against simplistic fragrances – with Daniel owning several – but he wanted to create a fragrance which takes you on a much longer olfactory journey. Daniel finds that he wears his most complex fragrances in the Fall and Winter when days are cool and nights are cooler, which motivated him to challenge his nose and create something for the true niche fragrance lover.
"PURPLE POWDER combines a melange of citruses, warm and cool spices, an enduring powderiness, woody, resinous, balsamic depth, and five different musks. A Gallagher Fragrance would not be complete without Patchouli, with PURPLE POWDER featuring a Patchouli Heart ingredient from IFF-LMR. PURPLE POWDER also features a helping of another Gallagher favorite: Madagascar Vanilla Absolute. So, grab your favorite cool-weather beverage and join Gallagher Fragrances on a journey into PURPLE POWDER." (info from the brand)

perfumes_data.name: 05 Dominoes FAAN for women
perfumes_data.short_description: 05 Dominoes by FAAN is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. 05 Dominoes was launched in 2024. Top notes are Cashmere Wood, Floral Notes, Animal notes and Rose; middle notes are Bergamot and Peach; base notes are Mandarin and Lemon.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Embark on a journey into the unknown with 05 Dominoes, a fragrance shrouded in mystique and luxury. This enigmatic perfume, designed for women who crave an air of intrigue, unfolds with top notes of Rose, Floral, Animalic, and Cashmere, creating a captivating and sensual aura. The heart notes of Bergamot and Peach weave a tale of subtle sweetness and fresh allure, while the mysterious base notes of Lemon and Mandarin provide an elusive yet invigorating finish. Tailored for both daytime and evening wear, the enduring formula ensures you carry an air of fascination throughout the day. The elegantly styled bottle, a perfect display piece, makes it an ideal gift for those captivated by the allure of the unknown. Immerse yourself in the enigmatic essence of the fragrance unravel the mysteries of confidence, elegance, and allure.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: The spirit of radiance. Bright and hopeful, a fragrance that is as inspiring as her. This Eau de Parfum opens with brilliant raspberry nectar, white strawberry, and mandarin orange fruits. Blooming florals at heart fade into a flash of prismatic musks for a multi-faceted glow. A warm, decadent aura is created with vanilla, Tonka, and amber crystals at the base.

perfumes_data.name: My Euphoria Calvin Klein for women
perfumes_data.short_description: My Euphoria by Calvin Klein is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. My Euphoria was launched in 2023. My Euphoria was created by Frank Voelkl and Nathalie Lorson. Top note is Black Currant; middle notes are Orchid, Sesame and Tuberose; base notes are Sandalwood, Agarwood (Oud) and Bamboo.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"Smoky yet sweet, this new multi-faceted floral amber fragrance captures the essence of joy and euphoria. A reimagination of the classic notes of the original fragrance collection, perfumers Frank Voelkl and Nathalie Lorson customized a blend of compelling ingredients while still highlighting the hero orchid note of the Euphoria fragrance collection. The new composition opens with juicy blackcurrant essence. At the heart, the feminine orchid flambé accord is contrasted by smoky black sesame for a sophisticated and fiery floral center. To round out the base, an exclusive blend of oud, bamboo and sandalwood creates a mysterious woody facet. The rich warmth of these notes, alongside a lasting trail of tuberose, creates an unforgettable fragrance that channels feelings of confidence and empowerment."
Calvin Klein My Euphoria is available in 10, 30, 50, and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The fragrance unveils a very petal like, sensual feminine tuberose paired with the cappuccino note. A solar, bewitching, opulent floral bouquet of exclusive Tuberose, submerged by the full bodied character of Cappuccino, a nod to the Italian heritage.
The hedonistic spirit of Roma in glass and light.
The rectangular glass bottle stands the true test of time. A transparency evincing that there is nothing to hide yet everything to discover. The studded cap made of glass echoes Maison Valentino’s signature emblem, the stud, a square and cruciform shape that pays homage to Rome and to the "bugnato" found on the Roman Palazzos. A recognizable insignia that has expressed the Maison’s identity over time.
The flacon is completed by a golden champagne spray button and the engraved VLogo. Echoing the fabric of Haute Couture boxes, each fragrance finds its name on the canvas fabric. A dimensional stud reflects each juice’s color at the base of the bottle.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Open a door, follow the light, and let yourself be guided through the night.
Forbidden, audacious, passionate, escapist, playful, or soothing: live your ideal night.
A fragrance where the depth of sandalwood and the warmth of bitter cocoa mingle with the comforting light of Marseille soap and cassie flower: an invitation to sensual, reassuring skin-to-skin contact.
An eau de parfum created by Nicolas Beaulieu. The perfumer's words: "reassuring, bewitching, sensual."
Top notes: neroli, petitgrain, Marseille soap accord.
Middle notes: cassie flower, cedar, patchouli.
Base notes: cocoa, sandalwood, hay.
Its formula is short: it contains 53 ingredients. A classic perfume can contain up to 300 ingredients, only mentioning potentially allergenic ingredients on the label (generally less than 10).
Each raw material was chosen by the perfume's creator, Nicolas Beaulieu.
